etext:
1
1 rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ mahA san+ti dr-iSh+tA tI gar+b+ha/ sarba bud+d+ha sha ya/ ga ga nor+m+mi bi pu la tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi sku/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad gsungs pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan kun rig rgyal po de// 'og min chos dbyings pho brang du// snying po byang chub sku bzhugs pas// rigs lnga'i 'khor la thugs gzigs te// ye shes 'khor lo'i dgongs pa las// g.yos pa med par lhun gyis grub// de tshe 'dus pa rnam bzhi yang// rnam gzigs gtsug tor thams cad skyob// 'khor 'jig bsod skyabs rin chen
2
1 mang// mar me log par dad sel dang// 'od srungs rin chen snying po dang// dbang po zhi dang pad+ma brtsegs// gser thub dang ni shAkya thub// mai tri+e mthu chen thob dang ni// spyan ras gzigs dang 'jam pa'i dpal// dri med phyag na dga' ba'i dbang// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyang bzhugs// sems dpa' rdo rje snang ba dang// ye shes dpal dang yon tan snying// skyon med grags pa grub pa rtsal// ye shes spyan ma rdo rje dbyings// dpal 'bar ma dang dpal ldan bde// las kyi sems ma chen mo rnams// rang rang gtso la 'khyud nas 'khod// gzhan yang chos srung sprul pa'i tshogs// 'jig rten mkha' 'gro pho mo dang// dregs can dam btags zhal 'ches pa// rang dbang med par dad 'dus rnams// rang sems rtogs par 'dod pa'i phyir// lus ngag sems kyis zol med par// thabs cig rim par 'khod gyur te// de tshe rdo rje sems dpa' yis// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa yi// thams cad sku gsung thugs dang ni// rdo rje las byung phun sum tshogs// kun rig rgyal po'i dgongs pa des// mngon par gzigs pa'i don go nas// rdo rje yid kyi don bskul ba// 'khor 'das ma rig rnal 'byor thugs// nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas pas// ye shes rnam par grol ba'i thugs// ngo bo nyid kyi sku bskyod nas// thugs dam dbang gis bzhengs su gsol// de skad bskul ba mkhyen gyur nas// ngo bo nyid las gzugs skur bzhengs// gzugs sku rol pa'i mdzad spyod kyis// 'od zer spros pas nam mkha' khyab// thams cad kun tu snang mdzad pas// 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas// rtse gcig lus ngag yid kyis kyang// rnal 'byor tshogs kyis phyag 'tshal nas// bden pa'i yid kyis yang bskul ba// 'khor 'das rtsa ba thugs kyi dbyings// shes rab chen por mnga' brnyes pas// sprul pa grangs med 'byung ba'i gnas// chos sku bde bas 'gro don gyis// de don bskul ba thugs chud nas// 'khor 'das ma reg don chen la// 'bral med dgongs par snyoms zhugs te// cang mi gsung bar lhun gyis bzhugs// de
3
1 nas blo gros dam pa de// cang mi gsung bar ngo mtshar te// dpa' bo mgon por yang zhus pa// e ma nam mkha' lta bu yi// sku mchog khyab pa'i byin rlabs kyis// thogs med rol pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// bdud dpung gzi brjid zil gyis gnon// yid bzhin gsung mchog sgra snyan gyis// tshig gcig don go thams cad 'dus// gzung sla yan lag tshang ba'i gsung// seng ge'i sgra yis gsang sngags gsung// ye shes snying po rdo rje'i thugs// nyi zla lta bur rang gsal ba// 'khor 'das spros bral thig le'i thugs// ye shes rig par byin gyis brlabs// thugs rje kun gyi bdag po khyod// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang mes po// rnal 'byor kun gyi dam pa'i lam// bdud rnams kun gyi bdud chen po// yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// byang chub sems kyi mdzod chen po// ma rig mun pa bsal du gsol// de skad gsol ba'i don go nas// bcom ldan ngo bo nyid sku des// 'khor rnams la ni thugs gzigs nas// phyogs bcur zhal ni 'dzum mdzad de// dper na nyi ma'i snying po las// 'od zer kun tu bkye ba ltar// khyab par mdzad cing bka' stsal pa// 'khor 'das med pa'i gong rol du// nga rtogs kun tu bzang po byung// gzhan pa'i zhi gnas blos bsgoms pas// sangs rgyas nyid kyang gdeng med gol// phra mo'i rnal 'byor smos ci dgos// de skad bka' stsal gsungs ma thag/ 'khor rnams ma dga' yid 'drogs te// don la the tshom za gyur te// mya ngan yid kyis zin gyur nas// 'jig rten kun 'gul rab tu g.yos// lha mi mi ma yin la sogs// kun kyang skrag cing ya ngar gyur// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// thugs kyis gzigs nas don rig pa// 'khor rnams zhi gnas bsam gtan la// zhen pa gsal bar yid gzigs nas// ting nge 'dzin gyis don gsol pa// 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes thugs rje chen po yis// chos nyid gnas lugs ji lta ba// ma nor ma bcos snying po'i thugs// 'khrul pa'i blo yis rtogs pa'i thabs// 'khor 'das ma rig lhag mthong don// dus 'dir bdag la bshad du gsol// rang byung ngo bo nyid sku des// don rig thugs kyis bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas chos nyid ji lta ba// 'khor 'das ma rig snying po'i don// yang mes nga yis don bshad du// rdzogs chen skye med don zab kyang// ma rtogs pa la sdig mor che// nor bu rin chen rnyed dka' bzhin// phyi ma'i dus kyi mi ngan rnams// dar drag ngang thung tshor rkyen la// bka' yi don la yid mi ches// gzhung mang sgrin tshig rtog pa za// byang chub pas ni khe grags bsgrub// le lo che bas grub rtags rings// 'jug la
4
1 brtson nas 'dor ba skyen// nges pa'i don la gal chen 'dzug/ bden pa'i tshig la sgro skur 'debs// tshig tu zhib la don tu rtsing// thos bsam pas ni ngom par rings// shes nas mi bsgrub yal bar 'dor// gong 'og gzhung ni bsres te bslad// bka' min mi chos don du byed// man ngag zab mo zong du 'tshong// tshig nyung zab mo gting phyin la// sha thang mi phyed spom zhes smra// gdams ngag blos chud mi gson par// don nyid rtogs par byed pa la// yid mi ches pa'i rigs pa 'dzug/ mang por bshad kyang don med la// mkhas pa yin zhes yon tan brjod// bla ma smod pa'i gang zag la// kho bden zer zhing rjes su 'jug/ gsang ba'i man ngag ma go bar// slob bus ma byas slob dpon 'khangs// khungs nas brgyud pa'i man ngag la// ma nor yin par mi brtsi bar// rang bzo kha tshabs bsres pa la// yid ches byed cing dam par 'dzin// lta dman rnams kyi ngo srung byed// de lta bu yi dus byung tshe// don bstan skad cig de nyid la// rgyud lung sangs rgyas skrag cing dngangs// nyan thos mdo sde brgyal cing 'bog/ lha dang lha min srin po'i tshogs// sgro skur 'dogs pa'i gang zag rnams// gtan du dmyal ba chen por ltung// 'di la tshe yi bar chad dang// 'jigs pa sna tshogs de la 'ong// mgo lus tshal pa stong du 'gas// rig 'dzin rnam kyis spongs par 'gyur// de phyir shin tu gsang ba'i don// snod ldan slob bu mi rnyed dkon// de skad bka' stsal don go nas// 'khor rnams mgrin gcig thal sbyar nas// yid kyis gdung ba'i don gsol pa// 'khor ba'i g.yang sar ltung ba la// thugs rje chen pos mi 'dzin nam// ri dwags 'dzin pa'i rgyar chud na// rnam rtog dra ba mi gcod dam// sems can las la thugs tshad kyang// 'gro don snying rje mi mdzad dam// ma rig mun pa'i smag rum du// dmus long bzhin du rang sems 'thibs// ye shes nyi ma mi 'char ram// zhe sdang me chen 'bar ba ni// las kyi rlung dmar chen pos bus// chos nyid rlan kyis mi 'jil lam// 'dod chags chu ltar brub pa yis// bse rtsi bzhin du zhen pa la// ye shes me yis ming bsreg gam// don stor lus kyi nang du stor// lam stor bdag la sa mkhan mdzod// dus 'dir 'dus pa rnams kyis kyang// 'gal sems rdul tsam med par ni// dad pas byang chub don la mos// nges shing dad pas yid bsdus so// de nas ngo bo nyid sku des// ye shes 'khor lo'i dgongs pa las// thugs ni mngon par bzhengs nas kyang// kun bzang chos sku'i rtogs don de// 'dus pa'i 'khor lo bka' stsal pa// legs so dad ldan 'khor rnams nyon// lhag mthong gsal bar ngas bshad kyi// legs par nyon la yid kyis
5
1 zung// gol sa chod pa'i lta ba yi// gdeng du go 'gyur rnal 'byor pas// ched du mi bsgom rang yin te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis// dbang po rang yan btang las byung// ma bsgoms ye shes shugs la 'char// gol med ye shes chos nyid klong// thugs kyi 'od zer stong gi cha// phyogs bcu kun tu rab spros pas// 'khor rnams sems la don shar nas// zhi gnas la ni lhag mthong du// rdul tsam du yang ma bsgoms par// phra mo cha tsam rtogs gyur nas// dga' ba'i yid kyis don bstod pa// 'khor ba'i nad 'byin sman pa'i mchog/ rab med sgrol ba chos kyi gru// 'jigs sar rten pa'i ye shes mkhar// drin med byams pa'i pha dang ma// 'dren mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ded dpon kun bzang chos kyi sku// 'khor ba'i lam med lam ston pa// rang rig ye shes byang chub klong// ye shes sku la yid kyis bstod// nam mkha' lta bur dngas ba yi// khyab gsal rab brjid skur ston cing// mkhas la rgya che shin tu gsal// e ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan gsung// shes rab gting phyin g.yos pa med// rgyun mi gcad la phyag 'tshal lo// ma rtsol bdud rnams 'dul mdzad pa// stobs ldan dpa' bo chen po ste// yon tan phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// ci bsam 'grub la phyag 'tshal bstod// da ni khyod kyi 'bangs su mchi// dpa' bo chen po bdag la dgongs// bka' las mi 'das yid kyis bzung// lta ba'i yang snying bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba'i don gsan nas// bcom ldan ngo bo nyid chen des// gdod nas 'bral med ting 'dzin la// bde bar zhugs nas bka' stsal pa// yang snying lta ba'i rgyud chen 'di// yid kyis bshad pas rtogs pa'i don// ngas shes ye shes dam par gyis// bdud dang bar gcod thams cad kyang// nga nyid rol pa las gzhan med// nga ma shes par ci spyad kyang// 'bras bu brlag cing 'tshig par 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas sku gsung thugs// skye 'gag med pa'i ye shes kyis// rgyun mi chad kyi dgongs pa la// thugs ni shin tu thim gyur to// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i tshogs la phan btags phyir// yid kyis nges don 'di skad gsol// dad pas bsgom dang rtogs pa yis// snod ldan snod ngan bye brag gi/ 'bras bu bstan pa bshad du gsol// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// khyod kyi zhus pa ngas bshad nyon// nga yi ye shes lhun grub la// re zhig mos pa drang ba'i phyir// spyi yi mtshan nyid rtogs pa'i thabs// brda' tsam mtshon nas zhen grol ba'i// rang don sems kyi mos pa yis// theg pa kun la thos bsam gnas// dben pa'i dgon par gang bsgom pa// rang
6
1 sems dmu rgod stong khams yin// mngal gyi sgrib g.yogs khang stong bsrung// bcos ma'i spyod pa sus bsgom pa// 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob 'dod pa// zhe 'dod yod phyir 'khor ba'i rgyu// snang ba sems su byas pa'i phyir// 'bras bu ye shes 'byung mi+e srid// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'khor 'das tshig tu brjod dka' ba// chos sku nam mkha' lta bu de// kun la gnas kyang rtogs par dka'// u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam na yang re 'ga' zhig/ 'byung srid kun gyi thun mong min// don 'di kun la bshad kyis nyon// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon las// nyan bshad sgrub pa'i dbang mnos nas// mched la sring ltar gdung byed cing// thos bsam bsgom par 'dod pa'i phyir// byang chub srog dang bsdo ba yi// snod ldan ma nor phrad gyur na// 'tsho ba rang gi sbyar la yang// lta ba'i dgongs don 'di bstan te// ma mtshon go dang ma dpyad rtogs// don ldan man ngag rig pa'i blos// ma bsgoms rtogs pas nges par chog/ de yi 'bras bu da lta nyid// sangs rgyas rgyal po ye shes sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes te// 'bras bu kun gyi mchog tu bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' da yang nyon// ngo bo nyid kyi chos sku la// 'das dang ma 'das mi mnga' yang// nga nyid dngos su mi bzhugs tshe// 'dzam gling dbus kyi shar phyogs su// skal ldan rigs kyi sprul pa gcig/ pha med bram ze'i rigs skyes nas// nga yi nges don lta ba 'di// gdams ngag mi 'chad ston pa 'byung// phyis kyi rnal 'byor 'jug 'dod pas// nga yi rgyud 'di rtogs par gyis// 'di shes bla ma dam par bzung// de bzung yon tan brjod mi langs// nges don 'di la gang mos rnams// bka' dang mthun par don go nas// rdul tsam du yang ma bsgoms kyang// sangs rgyas sa la smos ci dgos// de tshe dad ldan 'di la 'jug/ 'khor 'das ma rig chos sku'i don// las can kun gyi rtogs don chos// man ngag rdzogs chen bstan pa 'byung// de tshe nga yi 'khor rnams kyis// nges don lta ba 'chad pa la// lta dman tshul 'chos sde pa ni// sngags par khas 'che'i mu stegs dang// drang don theg pa la zhen rnams// zhe sdang byed pa'i dus byung tshe// kha zer 'phyar kha gtong ba dang// dug dang rdo dang mtshon sogs kyis// de la gsod par sems 'gyur zhing// sa phyogs mnga' ris 'gegs pa'i tshe// kun bzang lta ba nges don 'di// ngo bsrung tshul 'chos ma yin par// zhum med dam chos 'di 'chad pa// tsham tshom med pa dpa' bo'i mchog/ 'jigs med ma nor ston pa'i lam// bde gshegs rnams kyi byin gyis rlobs// mkha' 'gro chos skyong smos ci dgos// gnod pas mi tshugs bsod
7
1 nams 'phel// de tshe mu+u stegs nyan thos sogs// rang rang brkam chags rtsod 'gyur nas// g.yul 'gyed byed cing ru tra 'dra// rims nad sna tshogs bkra mi shis// yon bdag rnams ni dad pa ldog/ 'og ma'i bstan pa 'jig pa'i rtags// phyi ma ngan song smos ci dgos// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de lta bu yi dus byung tshe// gal te tshogs la chos 'chad na// nyams dang lkugs pa zhe 'khon rnams// yod med gsher la bshags su bzhugs// de mi nus par chos mi 'chad// dper na ldum rar dug skyes na// bdag pos dug tu shes ma thag/ rtsad nas phyung ste med par byed// de bzhin dam nyams mi mthong na// gang yin tshogs las bkar la btang// lta bshags ched du yid la bya// de ltar ma yin phyal bzhag na// rten med ma thug srog gcod bzhin// nyams grib skyon gyis na tsha 'byung// mkha' 'gros chad pa rims gyis gcod// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gal te dad pas gdung sems kyis// dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon 'gyod nas// bskang bshags g.yo sgyu mi byed pa// gser dngul chag bcos phyir legs bzhin// don la brtson 'grus shin tu che// de ni snod kyi dam pa'i mchog/ man ngag yang snying rdzogs par bstan// de don shin tu btsal dka'i phyir// snod la brtag pa shin tu gces// bka' dang mthun pa'i don 'grub phyir// ma brtags rang 'dod chos mi 'chad// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba thams cad kyi yang snying/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ bstan pa 'byung ba'i rgyu gleng gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// zhal gyis bzhes te bka' stsal pa// rgyud lung man ngag yul la blta// de phyir ma nor chos sku min// sems yin zer zhing snang bar 'chel// sems dang 'brel med brjod byas kyang// glang po phag dang 'dra ba bzhin// 'brel med don ni rtogs bya'i phyir// de phyir yul 'di sems 'dra yang// snang ba chos skur 'brel med pas// gzhi nyid rang sems rtogs par bya// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// yul gyi snang ba 'di nyid la// mtha' yas ming du btags pa yin// yod mthong snang grags chos rnams kun// bla dgas tsam du btags par zad// de la dngos gzhi ga la yod// med pa nyid na yod rtog pa// 'khrul pa rnams kyi shes pa la// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi mkhyen phyir// phyi rol yul la don mi bzhag/ de phyir 'khor 'das 'byung ba kun// glo bur yin phyir gnas lugs min// de phyir 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nga yi gsung gi 'od zer gyis// ma rig sems kyi mun khung du// sgron ma'i snang ba nyi bzhin 'char// yul dang ma 'brel
8
1 chos kyi sku// rang la rang chas ye gnas pas// lung ldan rkyen gyis rtogs pa byung// rgyu 'bras rkyen rnams ngas bshad nyon// ngo bo gnas lugs chos sku dang// de las 'khrul pas 'khor bar 'khyams// ldog thabs snod bcud ldan pa yis// nges pa'i don mthun gdams ngag gis// the tshom gegs chen bsal ba dang// 'bras bu lhun rdzogs gdul bya 'byung// de skad gsungs pa'i don thos te// 'khor rnams dga' zhing yi rangs te// gus pa'i sems kyi chos nyan to// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying// nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// dad ldan 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// sems kyi rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir// ched du brjod pa'i don gsungs pa// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi gzhir gyur pa// ngo bo nyid kyi sku mchog ni// rang byung yin phyir thog mtha' med// 'dus ma byas kyi nam mkha' 'dra// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ma mtshon go dang ma dpyad par// de nyid rtogs pa'i kun bzang la// mya ngan thog mtha' dus gcig gcod// ri bo ta la'i nyi shar 'dra// lung ldan rkyen gyi gdams ngag gis// thog ma'i gzhi shes rnal 'byor pas// 'khor ba'i mtha' ma shugs la chod// mun pa nam langs nyi shar 'dra// sems can rang sems 'khrul pa'i phyir// mtshon dpyad rtog pa 'khor ba'i chos// 'khrul pa yod phyir thog mtha' yod// phyi nang 'byung ba chags 'jig 'dra// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// 'khor ba'i gzhi ni zhen rtog yin// gzung 'dzin zhen pas 'khor bar snang// ras dkar la ni snum zhen 'dra// bag chags brtas phyir kun gzhi yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ye shes mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu// shes rab lhag mthong las byung ba// lung ldan rkyen gyis rtogs pa de// thig le chos sku de la bya// gnyis ka'i rgyu yi rgyu ru ni// rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi sku// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi yin phyir// ye shes rgyu zhes de la bya// rtogs ma rtogs la tha dad kyang// lung ldan rkyen gyi ye shes de// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu yin phyir// rgyu yi ye shes de la bya// bya byed lam gyi 'bad rtsol gyis// rang byung byang chub gegs yin pas// shes pa rtsol med ye shes 'di// lam gyi ye shes dam par gsungs// rtogs pa'i ngang las ma g.yos par// theg brgyad lam gyi spong len dang// pha rol mdzad spyod 'di yis 'grub// yon tan stobs rnams ma lus 'byung// ye shes 'bras bu 'di shes pas// dbul po rin chen rnyed pa bzhin// phyi ma ma yin dus 'di rang// rtsol med rig pa mngon sangs rgyas// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// mi gnas chos sku'i don
9
1 rtogs pa// 'ching grol dge sdig gnyis kyi chos// gzhi la gnyis ka gdod nas med// de phyir thig le nyag gcig go// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nyi ma'i dkyil na mun med ltar// de bzhin don rtogs ma bsgoms kyang// skye med byang chub chos sku'i klong// gol sgrib dag la ya mi nga// dper na seng ge'i sgra grags pas// ri dwags phra mo 'byer ba bzhin// don 'di rnal 'byor gang yod la// lta dman sgro skur zil gyis gnon// dper na pad+ma 'dam gnas kyang// dri mas mi gos shin tu gsal// de bzhin rnal 'byor lus yod kyang// sgrib pas mi gos ye shes gsal// dper na 'khor los sgyur rgyal nyid// gling bzhi gling phran dbang du bsdus// de bzhin don 'di rtogs pa yis// pha rol phyin bcu'i dbang rnams kyang// rang bzhin ma btsal lhun grub rdzogs// rnal 'byor gdengs su de 'chang na// de la bsgrub pa ma byas kyang// gcig shes pas ni kun shes pas// 'bras bu sangs rgyas smos ci dgos// de las gzhan pa'i don med phyir// lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i chos sku la// skye shi'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas// gzhi las mi 'gyur gser bzhin no// de skad gsungs pa'i don go nas// rang sems rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ rtse gcig dad pas gus gyur nas// la bzla ba la don gyis mos// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying// nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las// ched du brjod pas go bar bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas kun rig rgyal po la// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis don zhus pa// chos nyid rang byung gnas lugs kyi// dpe don khyad par gang gis dbye// yid ches pa yi gtan tshigs gang// kun bzang thugs ni ji ltar rtogs// zhus pa'i don gsan bka' stsal pa// dpe don khyad par ngas bshad kyis// nam mkhas gar khyab sems can gyis// nam mkha' dag la rig pa med// sems nyid ma bsgribs rig par gsal// de phyir nam mkha' byang chub dpe// 'degs byed rlung gi 'byung ba la// ye shes rlung gis byang chub khyab// dran rig dngos med byang chub dpe// chos nyid klong du mngon sangs rgyas// sdud pa'i chu la sems kyis khyab// chu nyid byang chub dngos ma yin// de bas rig pa sems kyi chu// byang chub skur ni mngon sangs rgyas// sra byed 'degs pa'i sa nyid la// rang sems snying po dngos med kyang// thams cad bskyed phyir byang chub dpe// 'gyur med sra phyir mngon sangs rgyas// drod snyoms tsha ba me 'di la// rang sems me yi gzhi med kyang// nyon mongs sreg byed dpe bstan pa// byang chub mer ni mngon sangs rgyas// 'byung ba lnga po 'di nyid kyang// don gyi sangs rgyas ma yin kyang// btags pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa'i
10
1 phyir// 'di la dgag sgrub ci yang med// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ma dros mtsho dkyil me 'bar ba// mthong nas gsal ba chu yis ni// bskal par de la gnod mi nus// de bzhin ma rig ye shes kyis// thog mtha' rtsa ba ma chod na// myang 'das yon tan mi 'byung phyir// 'khor ba zil gyis ci la non// bya khyung rgyal po rlabs chen gyis// rin chen nam mkhar thon pa'i tshe// rgya mtsho nyid kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur// de bzhin bla ma'i gdams ngag gis/ rang byung snying po rtogs tsam gyis// sdug bsngal nyid kyang bde chen 'char// tshig dang yi ges mtshon pa rnams// ming du btags pa'i chos kun nor// 'khrul rkyen dpe yis bstan pa'i phyir// dpe don dbye ba shin tu gces// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ mtshon pa'i dpe don ma yin par bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// don gyi dbye ba bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas pas kyang sems can gnyan// sems can dus nas ma rtogs na// dug lnga rang grol ci la 'ong// mnyam bzhag pas kyang rjes thob gces// rjes thob lta bar ma shes na// thun mtshams bsgom pas sangs mi rgya// lus la brten nas rtogs pa yi// dus bzhi'i gdams ngag ma shes na// ye shes 'bral med ci la 'char// da yang sems dpa' chen po nyon// skye shi gnyis kyi bar dor ni// lung bstan rkyen gyi gdams ngag zhu// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi bar dor ni// chos nyid gnas lugs rtogs par bya// yul sems gnyis kyi bar dor ni// phyi yi gol sgrib bcad par bya// mnyam bzhag rjes thob bar 'dor ni// rnam rtog ye shes blang bar bya// srid pa dag gi bar dor ni// sangs rgyas rgyal po ye shes sku// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la// nges don 'di rtogs khyad par 'phags// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// don rtogs pas ni 'dzin rtog nub// nyi ma shar nas mun pa med// lung 'di rtogs pas rtog pa bros// 'khor 'das 'byung ba rnam rtog bcom// spong sdud gnyis po 'chor med bzung// rtag chad gnyis po rdul du brlag/ zhen len gnyis po phyer mar btag/ bzang ngan 'dzin pa sprin ltar dengs// sangs rgyas sems can gcig tu byas// mtho ris ngan song rdzun du song// 'khor ba chos nyid ngang du brlag/ chags sdang skyes shing ting 'dzin gsal// g.yeng ba che na bde chen rgyas// skye shi med pa'i g.yul ngo rgyal// rig 'dzin rnams kyi thugs ngan sangs// rdzogs pa chen po blta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ don gyi dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas kun rig
11
1 rgyal po yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'gro drug sems can thams cad la// rang sems snying po ye shes ni// rtogs dang ma rtogs med par gnas// de yi chos nyid mtshon pa'i dpe// bar snang rkyen gyis mi tshugs ltar// rang sems stong pa'i ye shes ni// snga phyi med pa'i chos sku la// 'khor ba'i rnam rtog gzung 'dzin med// khyung phrug sgo ngar gshog rgyas ltar// rnal 'byor rang sems rtogs pa'i mi// mngal gyi sgrib g.yogs ma bral kyang// rang byung ye shes thugs la gnas// khu byug bya bran zil gnon ltar// chos sku sems la ngos zin pas// theg brgyad gol sgrib zil gyis gnon// de phyir 'khor ba ming yang med// seng phrug mngal du rtsal rdzogs ltar// lung ldan gdams ngag bstan ma thag/ sgrib gnyis ma spangs shugs la dag/ rtog pa mngon gyur sangs rgyas yin// pad+ma 'dam gyis ma gos ltar// dug lnga'i nang nas rang byung gsal// nyon mongs nyid kyang rang sar grol// ye shes don la 'du 'bral med// dngul rdos rang chos mi 'gyur ltar// dang po shes bzhin lung ma bstan// bar du nges pa'i don rtogs pas// da lta'i shes pa 'di nyid la// nges don chos skur rang gsal nyid// dus gsum mi 'gyur ye nas gsal// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang bzhin gzhi nyid spros bral bas// brjod du med par yid ches pas// yul la mi ltos don go'i phyir// dgos don gzhi nyid ye nas bden// ngo bo nyid kyi lta ba de// rtogs ma rtogs kyi khyad par las// 'khor 'das gnyis su shar ba yi// gang yang gnyis med yid ches pas// rig pa lta bar bzhag pa yin// chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid ni// mi g.yo gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyi// 'khor 'das gnyis la rtsa ba gcig/ de phyir ma yengs bsgom pa'i mchog/ ye nas rang sems 'gyur med pas// de dang mthun par rtogs pa yis// 'khor 'das ma rig 'bras bu la// re dogs med par lhun gyis grub// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// chu nyid rkyen gyis 'chang 'gyur ltar// bla ma'i man ngag don stobs kyis// ci spyod rang byung shar ba las// thog ma ma yin tha ma min// da lta'i shes pa 'di nyid las// bzang por song ba gang yang med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ yid ches pa'i gtan tshigs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la/ kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// don gyi gnas lugs bka' stsal pa// chos sku gzhan dang ma 'brel phyir// phyi nang snod bcud kun gyi gong// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis pas snga// bltar med ngo bo kun gyi gzhi// rang byung snying po chos sku dang// sangs rgyas rnams
12
1 kyis nga ma mdzad// sems can rnams kyis nga ma bcos// 'byung ba lnga la rag ma lus// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// thig le chos sku'i gzhi nyid nas// rgyu rkyen gnyis las 'das pa dang// gnyen po cis kyang mi tshugs shing// dus gsum mi 'gyur yang dag yod// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nam mkha' mtha' dbus med pa ltar// rang sems phyogs bcur dmigs dang bral// dmigs med chos skur shes shing rig/ de tsam nyid nas zhen med bde// nyi ma ma bsgribs gsal ba ltar// sgo lnga gsal la rtog pa med// rtog med snying po ye shes thugs// 'khor ba'i 'dzin pa kun dang bral// rin chen yon tan 'byung ba bzhin// don rtogs 'bras bu chos sku la// sangs rgyas che ba'i yon tan kun// ma btsal lhun gyis rdzogs pa 'byung// sa gzhi spyad pa'i gzhi yin ltar// rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi sku// 'khor 'das kun gyi gzhir gyur pa// rig dang ma rig khyad par las// rgyu 'bras rnams ni de las byung// rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa ltar// snying po rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi// ting nge 'dzin la g.yo ba med// de nyid ye shes chos nyid sku// ri bo 'gyur ba med pa ltar// yul med rig pa nges pa'i gzhi// rkyen gyis mi 'gyur byang chub sems// ma bsams 'du 'bral med par gnas// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi ni// rtog pa nga dang 'bral ba med// ma bral chos skur rtogs pa la// 'khor med yon tan bsam mi khyab// rnal 'byor dam pa las can gyis// yid kyi don rtogs ngo shes pas// kun bzang chos sku da lta nga// dman pa'i lus la sangs rgyas yin// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ kun tu bzang po'i thugs brtol ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ngo bo nyid kyi kun bzang la// bden pa'i tshig gis 'di skad gsol// chos nyid ngo bo gnas lugs dang// thog mar 'khor ba gang nas byung// tshogs brgyad chos sku ji ltar min// theg brgyad 'khrul gzhi ci las byung// ma rtogs bsgoms na ji ltar gol// lta spyod nyams pa'i nyes pa gang// rnam smin lus kyis ji ltar bsgribs// 'khor ba'i bag chags gang na gnas/ kun rig rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba'i don gsan nas// sems can 'khrul tshul thugs rje yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// gzhi la 'khrul pa byung ba ni// thog ma'i dus kyi mtha' drug ni/ kun gzhi rnam shes tshogs brgyad kyang// rang sems yin te chos sku min// yar ldan mar 'khrul 'khor 'das byung// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nyi ma 'char ka'i mdangs bzhin
13
1 du// dang po shes bzhin lung ma bstan// chos nyid dag pa'i rtsal yin kyang// lung ma bstan pas rkyen dbang gyur// ma rig rgyu la log rtog rkyen// rkyen bzhi dag gis bskyed gyur pas// ma rig rnam pa gnyis su tshang// zung du 'dzom nas kun gzhir grub// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yod med la sogs ma rig pas// thog ma med nas bden 'dzin pas// 'khor ba lugs 'jug phyir 'byung rtags// thag sbrul tho yor mi bzhin du// dbang po yul la rtag tu yengs// thar lam mi thob skye zhing 'chi// 'khor ba'i rgyu ni rtog pa ste// lta bas ma bsgyur yul la zhen// chos brgyad gzung 'dzin dam par blta// skye shi sdug bsngal mi 'jig phyir// bag chags mtshan mas rkyen byas nas// khams gsum 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyams// thar med 'khor bar kun gzhis byas// de phyir 'khor ba 'ba' zhig yin// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ 'khor ba dang po gang nas byung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba rnams kyi rtsa ba ni// yul dang sems ni gnyis su 'dus// yul kyang rang sems 'khrul pa ste// sems ni rnam shes tshogs brgyad la// sems las 'byung ba lnga bcu gcig/ rtsa ba kun gzhi nyid du 'dus// sems can kun la gnas lugs ni// phyi blta ba dang nang blta ba// gnyis kar bltas pa'i shes pa dang// bcos dgos pa dang mi dgos su// rtag chad bral don ngo bor gnas// yang dag yod dang byin rlabs su// lan du phye nas bstan pa'i don// tshogs brgyad sems su bstan pa yang// 'khor ba'i bag chags brtas pa'i phyir// nges don snying po ma yin no// de yang sems dpa'i snying po nyon// sgo lnga'i rnam shes ngo bo ni// yul snang tsam nas shes pa skye// yul mi snang tsam shes pa 'gag/ yid kyi rnam shes ngo bo ni// yul la sna tshogs sems pa'i phyir// chags sdang log rtog dag tu 'dzin// rnam rtogs sna tshogs ngo bor gnas// nyon mongs yid kyi ngo bo ni// nang du zhen pa dam par ni// rtag tu 'dun pa ngar 'dzin pa'o/ kun gzhi'i rnam shes ngo bo ni// ma rtogs tha mal dus tsam na// rtog pa rgyas shing rig pa bsgrib// rtogs pa mngon du gyur tsa na// ma rig bsgribs shing ye shes rgyas// gzhan du de dang mtshungs par ni// tshogs bdun skyes nas 'phel bar snang// tshogs bdun 'gags na bsgrib par snang// des na shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang// yang dag ma yin 'khor ba'i chos// de yang 'khor gyi sems dpa' nyon// sems can mos pa tha dad pas// gang zag blo yi rim pa la// gnas 'gyur chos su
14
1 bstan pa yang// bkri drang ldem dgongs tsam du bstan// de yi skyon yon khyad par ni// 'byung ba me chu'i dpe bzhin du// ye shes log rtog khyad par gyis// shes pa kun gzhi'i mtshan nyid ni// rgyu rkyen gnyen pos 'jig pa dang// dus gsum mi rtag 'gyur ba dang// bag chags mtshan ma'i rten byas pas// yang dag ma yin 'khor ba'i gzhi// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ tshogs brgyad chos sku min par bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas kun rig rgyal pos yang gsungs pa// log lta mu stegs rnam gnyis dang// phyi rol yang dag gsang sngags dang// gsang chen 'khrul tshul ngas bshad nyon// ngo bo chos sku gnyis med des// gzhi byas pha rol rgyu 'bras med// 'byung ba lnga byung rang zhi ste// chad par 'dod pa 'khrul pa yin// dngos med ngo bo mi 'gyur des// gzhi byas rang sems dngos po dag/ kha dog dbyibs su grub pa la// rtag pa ther zug 'dod pa 'khrul// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// snang ba chos kyi dbyings nyid kyis// gzhi byas sems la tha dad pas// phra rags 'dod yon rnam lnga'i yul// don dam bdag med 'dod pa 'khrul// drang don sgor zhugs skye bo dang// tshig la khyad yod don la med// de phyir nyan thos theg pa bas// rang sems ma rtogs shin tu gol// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ngo bo dngos med rig pa des// gzhi byas snang ba rang sems su// blos byas rig pa skad cig de// gong 'og mtha' bral shes dag 'khrul// rang sems rgyun gyi rtag par 'dod// bdag tu khas len mu stegs dang// tshig la khyad yod don la med// snang ba sems su 'dod pa'i phyir// sgro 'dogs sems tsam don la gol// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rig pa ngo bo gnyis med des// gzhi byas yul sems chos gzhig nas// skad cig ma de ma grub 'dod// stong par btags de don la 'khrul// mu stegs chad par lta ba dang// tshig la khyad yod don la med// yul sems gnyis la skur btab phyir// dbu mar 'dzin pa don las gol// de yang sems dpa' chen po nyon// 'gro drug sems can thams cad dang// nyan thos rang rgyal mdo sde bcas// nga nyid 'grogs pas ngo ma shes// de phyir blun po'i sbyor yul min// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ rgyu mtshan nyid kyi 'khrul tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// gsang sngags 'khrul tshul bka' stsal pa// dag dang ma dag gzhi gcig pa// yul med rang sems dag par 'dod// chos nyid ngang las bzang ngan
15
1 'byung// dngos grub gzhan la re phyir 'khrul// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// rje 'bangs tshul du spyod pa'i phyir// gtsang sbra spyod pa'i bram ze dang// tshig la khyad yod don la med// de phyir dag byed kri ya gol// gzhi la gnyis med ngo bo la// lta spyod gong 'og gnyis 'dod pas// lta spyod ya cha bdud kyi las// lta bas khyad par 'phags 'dod 'khrul// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// yul dang ma 'brel ngo bo las// dbyer med chos dbyings 'dod pa de// spun grogs tshul du mnyam zer nas// ting 'dzin gtsor byed tha dad 'khrul// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon/ kun rdzob yig 'bru lhar bskyed 'dod// don dam ma grub zer ba de// kri yog rnam gsum lta ba ste// mtshan nyid lta ba rnam pa gnyis// tshig la khyad yod don la med// de phyir kri yog don la gol// yo ga man chad nga yi gtam// ji snyed brjod pas nga mi rnyed// snang ba lha ru 'dod pa'i phyir// mtshan ma rags phyir nga mi rtogs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klongs yangs kyi rgyud las/ phyi rgyud rnam gsum gyi 'khrul tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// 'khor 'das ma rig chos sku la// yul sems snang stong dbyer med 'dod// rtog tshogs bzang ngan lhar gyur bsgom// bzang ngan 'byung phyir ma hA 'khrul// de yang blo gros dam pas nyon// rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi sku// skye med mkha' klong stong pa las// snang ba kun bzang rol par 'dod// gnyis med bde chen sras su bsgom// rtsol bas bsgom phyir a nu 'khrul// don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka'i chos// mtha' dbus med pa'i dbu ma dang// khyad med rgyud lung don ma rig/ de phyir rgyud lung lta ba gol// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rgyud lung rnal 'byor chen po las// nga tshol pas 'khor nga mi rnyed// nga ma rnyed pas snang ba 'chol// de phyir nga nyid rtogs mi 'gyur// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ bskyed rdzogs rnam gnyis kyi 'khrul tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la/ kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// don gyi gnas lugs ngo bo ni// 'khor 'das bar dor ma shes par// gang bsgoms ma rig rmongs pas gol// rang sems ma rtogs rtsol ba ste// yul gyi 'byung bar sems bsdus nas// gsal stong mnyam bzhag don tshol ba// dug lnga bsgoms pa'i gang zag de// bying rgod phrag dog bya ra mkhan// lta bar ma shes gti mug ste// gsal la mi rtogs 'dod chags bsgoms// de la zhen pa'i nga rgyal can// nyon mongs spong ba'i zhe sdang
16
1 gis// rtsa dang thig le'i thabs sgo nas// yul la dmigs pa'i bsgom pa po// rtog pa bzang ngan sems su byas// bsgoms kyang yul la 'gyur med phyir// ji bzhin ma nor don dang bral// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// dpyid dus so nam ma byas par// ston dus rtsa ru 'gro ba bzhin// rang sems don nyid ma rtogs par// bsgom du 'gro ba snying re rje// rkyal ma sbyangs pa chur 'jug 'dra// de bzhin ma rtogs su bsgom pa// 'bras bu mi 'byung bdud kyi las// rgyu mthun bag chags blor brtas pas// ljon shing bzhin du sdug bsngal rgyas// rang sems snying po ma rtogs pas// bsgom chen yin zhes phug la 'dug/ ma rtogs bsgom pa'i tshul ni ston// dmus long chung ma mdzes ma bzhin// ngo bo nyid ni ma rtogs par// 'khor 'das chos la ci bsam kyang// bsgom pas grol bar mi 'gyur ro// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// phra rab rdul ni gnyen pos spang// ris su 'dzin pa dbye ba spong// yod med 'chel bas rgyu 'bras spong// ched du spong pa'i rtog pa yis// blo yis gzhi nyid 'chos pa'i phyir// 'khor ba'i mtha' las thar pa med// rdzogs pa chen po blta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ bsgoms pa gol bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// lta ba'i dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ni// bla ma dag la ma brten par// gsang sngags gsang ba'i sgor zhugs nas// rang dbang ma thob gzhan dbang bskur// mkhas la smod cing gzhan la 'gran// rang la don gyi gdeng med par// dregs shing nga rgyal mkhas 'dod nas// tshig tsam lung las khungs phyungs nas// rtsal bshad tho chos gzhung nyams byed// dmyal bar nges 'gro gtan du 'khyams// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// nong pos blon gral mi 'dzin bzhin// nyan pa'i dbang ni ma nos par// gsang sngags rgyud chen mnyan pa rnams// srog gi bar chad tshe thung 'gyur// sdar mas dpa' bo mi nus bzhin// 'chad pa'i dbang ni ma bskur par// rgyud dang sgrub thabs gang 'chad pa// lce la zhing rmod dmyal bar skye// gdol pas rgyal sa mi zin bzhin// bsgom bsgrub dag gi dbang med na// dam rdzas 'dre bkren nyod par 'gyur// rang nyid gling bar mun par skye// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dper na rgyus med dug 'thung bzhin// sku yi dam tshig nyams pa ni// sum ldan rdo rje slob dpon la// brnyas shing ngan sems bskyed byas na// rdo rje dmyal ba chen por ltung// ngo ma shes nas gnyen gsod bzhin// gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa ni// snod med chos bshad lha mi dga'// 'bras
17
1 bu mi thob smyo 'bog 'byung// don ma rig par mna' za zhing// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// gsang mi thub cing 'dzag pa yis// lkugs pa'i dmyal ba chen por skye// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nar ma phyin na shed mi rdzogs// gong 'og la shan ma phyed cing// lta ba'i snying po don med na// gol sa mi chod rgyud mi grol// dbang med gros thag mi chod bzhin// don gyi gdeng med rkyen mi thub// gdams ngag med pas sems mi rtogs// lus ngag chos spyod sangs mi rgya// gshog ma rgyas par 'phur mi nus// nyams su ma blangs kha tshig gis// chags sdang zil gyis mi non te// skye bo rang rgyud pa ru gol// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dper na spun ngan rang sdug bzhin// gang yang goms par ma byas par// zhi gnas las su mi rung phyir// snang ba'i zhen pa ci la zlog/ mun sros lam ni stor ba bzhin// lhag mthong gsal bar ma rtogs par// gzugs sku rnam gnyis mi 'byung bas// sems can 'gro don byed mi nus// 'bras bu lo nyes lto bkres bzhin// lta bsgom gcig tu ma shes na// res 'jog thun mtshams bsgom pa de// 'bral med rgyun gyi rnal 'byor min// rdo rje sems dpa' da yang nyon// gos gon mi shes dral ba bzhin// lus kyi spyod pa ma bsrungs nas// tho cho spyod pa'i las byas na// 'bras bu sdug bsngal rgyu ru 'gyur// za mi shes pas brnangs pa bzhin// ngag gi spyod pa ma bsrung nas// gzhan gyi chos la skur pa 'debs// phyi ma tsha ba'i dmyal bar skye// 'thung ma shes nas 'bo ba bzhin// yid kyi spyod pa ma bsrung na// bdag du rtog pas gzung 'dzin skyes// phyi ma mun pa'i dmyal bar skye// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rgyus med ngo mi shes pa bzhin// las kyi go rim ma shes na// gsang sngags mdzad spyod nyams pa yin// mthu dang byin rlabs med par 'gyur// mig med lam mi mthong ba bzhin// phyag rgya ye shes ma gsal na// ye shes lha yi don rtags med// mchog gi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// gru med chu ni mi sgrol bzhin// bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir// ting 'dzin gsal bar ma gyur na// gnas ma 'byongs shing bgegs su skye// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dbang dang dam tshig la sogs pa// nyams par byed pa'i gang zag de// skyes bu'i lag par brkyang bskum tsam// skad cig gcig la dmyal bar ltung// de yi sdug bsngal brjod mi langs// de las 'jigs shing thar 'dod kyang// rang sems snying po ma rtogs par// ma hA yo ga man chad kyis// bskang bshags gzhung du byas gyur kyang// lta ba nyams pa bskang ba med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi
18
1 rgyud las/ lta spyod nyams pa'i skyon bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la/ kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// rnam smin lus dang ma bral bar// sangs rgyas yon tan 'byung mi srid// mtshan dang dpe byad stobs dang ni// mi 'jigs chos ni bco brgyad kyang// da ltar mi 'byung lus kyis bsgribs// khyung chen sgo ngar shog rgyas kyang// ma bcag bar du 'phur mi shes// de bzhin sems rtogs rnal 'byor pas// lus 'dis che ba'i yon tan bsgribs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rgyud lung slob dpon spre'u 'dra bas// nga yi drang don rtsed mo la// tshe yi dngos grub thob 'dod pas// thun mong sman gyi sbyor ba yi// bcud len ri lu rgyun ldog dang// 'o mas lus gsos bkrag rgyas tshe// dug mtshon la sogs tshugs mi 'gyur// bya bzhin 'phur ba byung nas kyang// rmi lam mngon shes phra mo 'ong// lha dang bgegs la dam par 'dzin// rang sems ma rtogs 'khor ba'i phyir// lus 'di phyi rol yul yin pas// gnas skabs 'bral med yod mod kyang// thabs sbyor mi grol shin tu 'ching// de bas blo gros dam pa nyon// sems can lus dang ma bral bar// sangs rgyas yon tan ci la 'byung// lus bcas 'bras bu thob 'dod pa// shin tu gti mug smad pa'i gnas// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// bcom ldan 'das kyang rtsa mchog tu// rang lus bor nas bar do la// 'og min gnas su mngon sangs rgyas// sems can kun la smos ci dgos// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ lus dang ma bral bar sangs mi rgya bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// ma rtogs bar dor 'khyams pa ni// thog mar 'khrul pa'i gzhi gnas kyis// 'dod chags gnyid dang 'jig tshogs rnams// sngar gyi skye ba blangs pa'i rtags// de phyir gzhi gnas bag chags yin// de yang blo gros dam pa nyon// ma rtogs tshe 'phos bar do ni// sprin dang ling tog mun pa yis// chu bur mig ni sgrib pa bzhin// ma rig ngo bo nyid sku bsgribs// mig phyung long ba'i bag chags bzhin// de tshe sngon gyi gnas dran ste// gos dang gnyen 'dun dran pa 'byung// lus kyi mig bral 'thoms nas sdug/ dper na 'dab chags mkhar 'gro yang// 'dod pa'i dbang gi rnyis 'dzin bzhin// dbang po kun tshang grol ba'i phyir// ma rig dbang gis rkyen 'gyur 'jug/ lta ba'i shes rab mig med phyir// lus ngag dge ba ci spyad kyang// rdul tsam mi phan don med 'khyam// bar do'i gnas su don dran med// gcig gam tha dad gang len
19
1 pa// char sogs sdug bsngal nyen gyur pa// bu ga spyil bu khyim sogs su// dbang med shugs kyis mngal du 'jug/ lta ba'i shes rab mig med phyir// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ma rig bag chags rnam gnyis kyis// mi shes bzhin du skye ba'i gnas// rnam bzhi gang rung las kyi skye// mtho dman gnas la gdam dbang med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ srid pa bar do'i bag chags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// 'khor ba'i sa mtshams bka' stsal pa// dper na mun pa'i smag rum du// rang gi mgo bo thug pa ltar// phyis 'byung ma rig rkyen gyis bslang// nyon mongs rang rgyud rim gyis skye// lang tsho bab pa'i skyes bu ni// 'gro ba bzang mos bslus pa bzhin// 'jig rten kha brid nyon mongs pa// zhen pa'i dbang gis sems la 'chang// dper na rgya mtshor nor len pas// nga rgyal gyis ni sa 'khor bzhin// brtsam pa'i rjes su nyon mongs pas// skye rga na 'chir thar pa med// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dang po sems kyi kun gzhi de// rgyu rkyen ngan pas bskyed pas na// min pa'i chos la yid 'dzin pas// nyon mongs thams cad bskyed par byed// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sa bon yin// bar ma bag chags kun gzhi de// snga ma'i rjes su 'brang byed cing// rang byung mi nus rkyen la ltos// skyed pa'i rkyen ni rnam bzhi'o// tha ma lus kyi kun gzhi de// chags sdang lnga la dngos su spyod// de yi sdug bsngal 'bras bu ni// skye rga na 'chi bsam mi khyab// sems can kun la gnas pa yis// kun gzhi 'khor ba'i gzhi yin pas// chos kyi sku yi gzhi nyid min// de phyir kun gzhi 'dus byas la// rkyen gyi dbang gis 'khor ba ste// chu bo bzhi yi mtha' la chud// ma bsgral bar du thar mi srid// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ 'khor ba da lta gang na gnas pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad gsol// 'khrul ba bzlog pa'i thabs chen gyis// snod bcud dag pa'i rtogs thabs gang// rang byung ye shes ci ltar dbye// tha ma 'khor ba ji ltar brlag kun rig rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i thabs chen de// dad pa brtson 'grus dam tshig gsum// rtogs pa'i thabs su shes par bya// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// bram ze zla dpal ji bzhin du// bla ma dam pa don ldan la// lus dang srog la mi blta bar// gus ldan man
20
1 ngag gnang bar gyur// dper na drang srong rlung nad can// sman pa'i ngag ni nyan pa bzhin// 'khor 'das gcig tu bstan pa la// skrag cing ya nga med par zhu// gzhan gyis ma bslad bud med la// dus tshod zin pa'i bu bzhin du// the tshom med par dad pa yis// rang sems don gnyis rtogs par gyis// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'khor 'das rtsa ba gcig pa'i phyir// seng ge lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyis// sngags dang mtshan nyid ma rig pa'i// 'khor 'das rtsa ba'i gdams ngag zhu// glang chen mi ldog dgra 'joms bzhin// bla ma'i spyod pa mi rtogs par// chos nyid gdams ngag don la brtag/ brtson 'grus mi ldog the tshom gcad// sa ku tse yi rkang lag bzhin// bdag nyid spyod lam thams cad du// don la yengs pa med par ni// yid la rgyun du dran par bya// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// brtse gdung dam tshig chen po ni// ma med bu ni mi 'byung bzhin// rang sems ma rtogs sangs rgyas ni// dus gsum btsal yang mi rnyed pas// tha mal 'di las btsal mi bya// gzugs spangs grib ma mi rnyed bzhin// dug lnga spangs pa'i pha rol na// sangs rgyas bya ba'i ming yang med// de nyid rtogs na chos sku yin// dper na zangs lcags la sogs la// gser 'gyur rtsi yis thebs pa bzhin// rang gi sems kyi dug lnga la// man ngag rtsi yis thebs pas rtogs// dug la sngags btab dpe bzhin du// dug ma bsal bar sman 'gyur bzhin// dgag bsgrub med pa'i don gyis na// dug lnga ye shes ngo bor shar// nor bu rin chen rnyed pa'i mis// 'jig rten so nam mi dgos bzhin// ma bsgoms sems kyi don rtogs nas// de las mi 'da' dam tshig yin// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i dus thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// rang byung ye shes chen po yis// yin min dbye ba ngas bshad kyi// yid kyis nyon la legs par zung// ye shes ma yin rang byung de// sems can kun la yod mod kyang// ma rtogs phyir na ye shes min// long ba mig mkhan ma rnyed 'dra// rang byung med pa'i ye shes de// gnas 'gyur ye shes lngar 'dod pa// rkyen gyis 'gyur phyir rang byung min// ra gan gser du 'dzin pa 'dra// ye shes rang byung ma yin pa// yid gnyis kun gzhi glo bur rkyen// yid 'khrul phyir na gnyis ka min// ri bong ra yi kha dog 'dra// rang byung ye shes yin lugs ni// shes rab lhag mthong las byung ba// ye nas gnas pa'i rang byung de// lung ldan rkyen gyis rtogs pa'i phyir// rang byung ye
21
1 shes 'dzom pa ni// mar gyi yang zhun lta bur gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ rang byung gi ye shes kyi dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// lung ldan bla ma'i gdams ngag gis// rang sems snying po chos sku ni// bstan na de ma thag tu shes// ma bstan bar du shes mi srid// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang rig ye shes 'od po che// 'gro 'ong med par 'khor ba brlag/ ma rig log pas ye shes skyed// 'khor ba ru bzlog mya ngan 'das// ye shes ma bsgoms lhun gyis grub// don dang mthun par nyams myong skye// bsgoms kyang de nyid ye shes skye// de phyir rtog pa rab tu gces// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ tha ma 'khor ba rang brlag tu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po la// yid kyi dran pa 'di skad gsol// nges pa'i don mthun gdams ngag gis// ngo bo nyid kyi sku mchog gang// snang ba chos dbyings ji ltar lags// rang sems chos sku ji ltar sprad// 'bral med mthun 'jug ji ltar spyad// gsang ba rnam bzhi'i gnang bkag gang// bsgom med la ni ji ltar bzla// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhus pa'i don gsan bka' stsal pa// nga yi chos nyid gnas lugs ni// sems can med pa'i gong rol du// bag chags ma bsags lus ma blangs// sangs rgyas med pa'i sngon rol du// rtogs pa ma bzhag byang ma chub// 'khor 'das ma rig kun gyi gzhi// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// dngos med sems kyi snying po ni// 'dus ma byas pa'i gnyug ma la// bzang ngan rnam rtog gting nas med// rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying po yin// ma rig med pa'i rang 'byung ni// mi srid phung po ga la skye// lus med chos sku 'gyur med de// rang 'byung sangs rgyas yang dag yod// tha snyad ming bas nga snga'i phyir// yod cing rtag par sgro ma 'dogs// stong pa nyid pas nga snga'i phyir// nga la med par skur ma 'debs// 'byung bzhi ma 'brel rig pa la// sgrib byed med par rang gsal 'di// dus gsum gcig pa shes pa'i rgyun// ma byung ma skyes da lta nyid// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// rang byung sku la skye 'chi med// de phyir 'khor ba ltung ma myong// don ma rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas med// de phyir mya ngan 'das ma myong// rang gsal nga nyid kun gyi mes// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dngos po med pas nam mkha' 'dra// mi 'gyur sra bas rdo rje 'dra// skye ba med pas a dang 'dra// don ma yin phyir dpe 'di bstan// ngo bo nyid kyi
22
1 sku mchog ni// dngos po mtha' bral nyon mongs ldog/ stong pa'i mtha' bral ngo bo nyid// gnyis ka las bzlog chos kyi sku// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// mtshan nyid phyir bltas 'dra ba med// rgyal po gdung chang bu bzhin du// kha dog 'di 'dra mtshon mi nus// gdod nas dpe med chos kyi sku// nang du bsam pa'i yid med de// nam mkha' lcags kyis byug pa bzhin// rig tshor rnam pa cir yang snang// dran pa nyid ni ye shes klong// yul gyi snang grag 'di nyid la// nyi ma shar nas mun med ltar// da lta'i rang sems chos kyi sku// de la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin med// 'gro drug sems can thams cad la// til la mar gyis khyab pa bzhin// rang sems ye shes byang chub sems// bder gshegs snying po chos skus khyab// ye nas don dang mi bral ba'i// lung ldan rkyen gyis rang sems rtogs// nor bu rin chen 'od bzhin du// ye shes dag pa 'char nub med// 'khor ba dag gi mtshan nyid kyang// min pa tsam gyi mi spangs par// yang dag don du mi bya'i phyir// dgag bsgrub med pa tsam du bzhag/ mya ngan 'das pa'i chos kun kyang// yin pa tsam gyis mi blang bar// sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par// ched du mi bsgrub btang snyoms bzhag/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ rig pa ma bslad ngo bo nyid kyi sku bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// snang ba'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa// rnam bzhi'i phyi la bar snang nang// gsum bral snang ba chos kyi dbyings// gcig las tha dad dngos 'dzin pas// nyi ma'i zer dang 'char dogs bzhin// dgag bsgrub med phyir chos kyi dbyings// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dred mo gdos thag ma chod par// brid bsdig gnyis kyis mi phan bzhin// yul dang gol sa ma chod par// ci bsgom don med 'khor bar 'khyams// 'khrul pa las ni yul med kyang// 'byung ba chen po lnga nyid la// rang sems rig pa'i don med bar// rang byung yin phyir ye shes min// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gser dang ser po'i tshul bzhin du// byis pa tha dad zhen zlog phyir// bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel ba yod// de phyir yul 'di spang mi dgos// phyi yi 'byung bar sems sdud pas// zer mthong snying po ma mthong bzhin// gnyis med snang stong khas mi len// yul la rtsod phyir don mi rtogs// bden pa mthong ba'i dge slong ni// 'khor 'das longs spyod mi sdud bzhin// gzhi la snang ba med pa'i phyir// yul 'di sems su blos mi sdud// me dang du ba'i tshul bzhin du// snang ba 'di la rang rgyud du// rang sems yul du 'khrul pa yis// bdag tu
23
1 rtog pa'i zhen pa zlog/ kun du rgyu ba'i skye lam bzhin// mthar thug 'brel pa med pa yis// tha dad gcig tu mi bsam pas// snang ba 'di la don mi bzhag/ da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dper na khyung chen mkha' lding la// chu klung gyen thur nyams mi nga// bar snang khams kun lam du bde// dmigs pa'i sa phyogs yud kyis phyin// de bzhin snang ba ma bcos pas// sna tshogs mdun na snang bzhin du// snang tsam nyid nas spang sdud med// zhen med rnal 'byor spyod yul la// 'khrul pa'i rtog pas gzhi mi 'gyur// btsal ba'i bsam pas dbyings mi bskyed// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nyi ma lta bu'i chos kyi sku// thig le'i rtsal ni ma 'gags pas// sgo lnga gsal ba nyi zer 'dra// ngo bo gcig phyir dgag bsgrub med// de phyir chos kyi dbyings zhes bya// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ snang ba ma bcos chos kyi dbyings bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig sems kyi rgyal po yis// chos sku ngo sprod bka' stsal pa// rnam smin lus dang bcas pa yis// tha mal kun gzhi gzhi cha la// snga phyi rang bral chos sku gsal// chu dngas rnyog med dpe bzhin no// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yang dag zab mo chos sku ni// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// rnam rtog mtshan ma gzhi nas med// nyon mongs ngar 'dzin rnams dang bral// 'phel 'grib skyon rnams ngang gis med// de yi ngang la gnas thabs ni// snga phyi gzhi la med shes pas// sems can dus na chos kyi sku// yid kyi yul du ma bsgoms kyang// rang byung rig pa'i ting 'dzin gsal// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rang gi thig le'i don lta na// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo tshad du// rim gyis bsgoms par ngas bshad kyis// gzhan du ma yengs yid la zung// tha ma rnal 'byor sgom pa pos// snga phyi med pa'i gnyug ma la// ma 'phros ma bying rang lugs tsam// de la rgyun du ma yengs bsgom// chags sdang dbang gis 'phro gyur na// don dam dgag bsgrub med pa'i phyir// rang byung snying po rang shar bas// ba mor nyi shar ji bzhin no// gti mug dbang gis bying ba ni// rang sems shes pa gzengs bstod la// phyi rol yul la mi spyad par// dbang po sgo dbye yan du gzhug/ 'bring gi rnal 'byor sgom pa pos// chos sku nam mkha' lta bu la// ji bzhin pa yi ye shes de// brjod med rgyun mi chad par lta// gal te byung tshor rtag chad rnams// rnam rtog ye shes bskul mar shes// me la shing bsnan ji bzhin du// de tsam nyid nas bsgom pa gsal// sgo lnga shes pa rmugs gyur na// nyams gsum bsres pa'i don
24
1 dran pas// chos nyid ye shes klong du bying// bum nang rin chen gter dang 'dra// dbang po rab kyi bsgom pa la// nyams dang mi nyams med pa'i phyir// 'bral med don la bcos mi dgos// sprin med nam mkha' ji bzhin no// de yang blo gros dam pa nyon// nyi zla gzas zin dpe bzhin du// dbyings dang chos sku dus mnyam phyir// chos nyid rang gsal rang gnas pas// ye shes mi 'bral rdzogs pa yin// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ rang sems chos skur ngo sprod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// 'bral med spyod pa bka' stsal pa// rang sems lta ba rtogs pa yis// mnyam rjes dug lnga gcig tu shes// de tshe nyon mongs ci spyad kyang// ngo bo nyid la 'phel 'grib med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de tsam nyid na ngo bo nyid// de don mi brjed rtogs pa'i phyir// ched du byas la bsgom mi bya// ma gi ta la gang reg 'dra// yul nyid sems su mi bsgom pas// dran rig chos nyid byang chub sems// de nyid spyod pa'i yul las 'das// de phyir don la nyams pa med// de yang 'khor gyi sems dpa' nyon// gnyid nyid bsgom par gsal thebs nas// ldog ka sad ka'i dus dag tu// de tshe chos sku'i don dran na// rin chen ga 'ur bcug pa 'dra// gshog rno rdul med tsha grang snyoms// mi 'tshub chu yi nya bzhin du// rmi lam 'brel thabs med par 'byung// tshogs drug 'gags kyang chos skur gnas// de yang 'khor gyi sems dpa' nyon// 'chi ka bar do'i don dran na// gnad gcod sdug bsngal ci byung yang// 'jigs pa brgal 'dod mi bzhin du// ched du dran pa shin du gces// na ba ta yi mig gnyis 'dra// rtsa drod yod la srog dang bral// rtsa med drod bcas bkrag ma nyams// chos kyi sku ni dran pa'i rtags// na tsha byung na smos ci dgos// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dbang po 'bring gi rnal 'byor pas// gzhi shes mngon du ma gyur pas// lus su zhugs kyang don dran te// rtogs pa yin phyir mngal na bsgom// tshe 'phos nas ni mngon sangs rgyas// tha ma phyi rol brtags pas brjed// dran tshe rkyen dang phrad pa'i phyir// skad cig zur tsam brda' yis ni// the tshom med par don go nas// skye ba gcig gis sangs rgyas 'grub// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de ltar ma rtogs rnal 'byor pas// ji ltar bsgoms kyang don med 'khyams// 'khor ba lugs kyi nad du 'jug/ de tshe lus kyi bza' bgo ni// mi dgos gnyid mi 'ong zhing bde// gsal la yul gyi rtog pa med// dus la ma bab bar du ni// mkhas kyang lta sgom bstan thabs med// bum pa nang gi mar me 'dra// de
25
1 yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sangs rgyas sems can rnal 'byor pas// so sor snang ba ma yin te// ma 'khrul ma rtogs gong rol gyi// ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang ni// ma 'khrul rtogs pa'i kun bzang thugs// 'khrul nas ma rtogs sems can sems// 'khrul kyang rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor thugs// ngo bo gcig phyir gol sa med// de tshe chos sku zad ka ma// mi 'gyur brtan pas gser bzhin no// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klongs yangs kyi rgyud las/ dus bzhi rigs spyod bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// mthun 'jug thabs kyi spyod pa yi// tshogs chen ma lus rdzogs pa yis// 'gro don thugs rje mthar dbyung phyir// rdzogs chen shin tu rnal 'byor pas// bla med go 'phang mchog brnyes par// sems can gnas phyir bla ma bkur// bla ma bsgom na chos sku bsgom// lha sku'i 'bum phrag stong bsgoms pa'i// bsod nams de yi char mi phod// de phyir dkar po'i chos spyod kyi// nyan bshad bsgom dang 'dzin pa dang// mchod gtor la sogs gang byed kyang// sngon du 'gro ba'i las byed phyir// bla ma dus gsum sangs rgyas dpal// dkyil 'khor sgor zhugs thams cad kyi// 'bral med yi dam lha tshogs dang// man ngag rgyud don rang rig lha// rtsol med 'bras bu'i chos dang ni// don ldan rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro la// lus ngag yid kyis phyag 'tshal nas// bla med mchod gtor gtong ba'i tshe// phyi yi 'jig rten snod nang du// bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho gting zab gyur// de steng 'bru yi phye btab pas// gser gyi sa gzhi chen por gyur// me tog sna tshogs gtor bas na// 'dzam gling bye ba phrag brgyar bsam// rin chen sna lnga brdar bas ni// rin chen ri bdun ma bskyed rdzogs// snying po rnam lnga blugs pa yis// mi brjed dran pa'i gzungs thob 'gyur// sman lnga 'bru lnga blugs pa yis// nad dang mu ge'i bskal pa thar// lta bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir// mgron bzhir rim pas bsngo mi dgos// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bsngo ba med pa'i bsngo ba ni// bla med mya ngan 'das pas na// 'jig tshogs dmyal ba yan chad du// bla med mchod sbyin 'di bsngos pas// sems can bsam pa 'grub gyur nas// lhun grub sa la gnas par shog/ rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ phyi'i mchod gtor btang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos yang gsungs pa// nang gi mdzad spyod tshogs chen ni// phrin las rnam pa bzhi yi chos// don ldan dbang bskur byed la
26
1 sogs// tshogs mchod rim pa gang byed kyang// yid mthad pa yi gnas dag tu// dam tshig sel med 'khor tshogs bcas// dkyil 'khor maN+Dal gzhung bzhin du// ye shes tshogs chen bsags pa'i phyir// dga' ldan lha yi longs spyod dang// 'byor ldan mi yi longs spyod dang// dgongs ldan 'phrul gyi longs spyod rnams// yid dang dngos su bsags bsams la// sngon du 'gro ba'i las byas te// gnas khang byin gyis brlabs pa dang// ting 'dzin zhal zas spro bskyed nas// dam can 'du bar bsgo ba dang// thugs dam bskul dang tshar bcad nas// gsang ba'i lha mos mtshams bcad de// rnal 'byor nongs bshags byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor bskyed dang dbang bskur dang// don rtogs byin gyis brlabs mi dgos// ma rtogs sngags dang yig 'brus brlab// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yid kyi mdun gyi nam mkha' la// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang// bla med khrag mthung rigs lnga'i tshogs// rig 'dzin rje btsun bla ma rnams// mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas spyan drangs nas// ci 'byor pa yi tshogs drangs nas// de nas rnal 'byor dad ldan gyis// snang ba gzugs kyi mchod pa dang// sgrogs pa sgra yi mchod pa dang// thabs dang shes rab bde ba yis// ye shes lha la rdzogs par mchod// lhag ma rol la lha bshags dang// skye shi dus kyi smon lam btab// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de ltar tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs mi'i// stong gsum sangs rgyas sar shes kyang// grong yul gnas la chags mi bya// ci spyod rgyal ba'i mdzad spyod kyang// 'du 'dzi g.yeng phyogs dbang med gtang// rnam smin lus dang ma bral kyang// sems la chos sku shin tu gsal// nyin dang mtshan mo dbye ru med// ci spyod rang byung ye shes la// ma chags dang du blang ba med// rtog pa skyon du 'bor ba med// dka' thub tshul gyis bsdam pa med// gang yang blo yi rten med kyang// 'on kyang ma go drang ba'i phyir// re zhig tsam du dkar chos spyod// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ gsang sngags kyi tshogs 'bul ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ni// srog ni rnam pa gnyis su 'dus// ma rig thar pa gang spyod pa// de yi bye brag ngas bshad nyon// thar pa mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// sems gsang lta nyams rang srog gcod// nyon mongs dbang du gyur pas na// 'dus byas chos kyis mi skyob ltung// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// dug lnga 'khor ba'i rtsa ba ni// ma rig kun gzhi yin pa'i phyir// lus can srog ni bcad
27
1 mi 'gyur// kun bzang shes rab mtshon rnon gyis// thog mtha'i bar du ma rig bsad// de yang sems can srog 'di la// lus 'di gnas skabs 'brel yod kyi// lus can srog ni bcad mi bya// gal te zhe sdang srog gcod na// rang sems ma rtogs tha mal te// skyabs 'gro nyams phyir dmyal bar ltung// skye bo bdun 'gyur sdig pa che// de yang blo gros dam pa nyon// nam mkha' me yis mi tshig bzhin// de bzhin don rtogs rnal 'byor pas// slob dpon sku dgra la sogs pa// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu bsgral 'gyur kyang// sgrib par mi 'gyur tshogs su 'gyur// ngo bo nyid kyi skur dran na// ma rig srog ni bcad pa'i phyir// srog gi nang na dam pa'i mchog/ de dang mi 'bral mngon sangs rgyas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gzhan gyi mi dang mi ma yin// rgyud bzung nor ni dngos po'i rdzas// gsang sngags sgor zhugs rnal 'byor pas// rku ba'i sems kyis blang mi bya// de phyir bdag nyid rdzas la yang// ma byin blang sems dran na ni// yi dwags gnas su skye 'gyur gsungs// gzhan gyi rdzas la smos ci dgos// de yang blo gros dam pa nyon// rgya mtsho skyogs kyis mi 'grib ltar// don rtogs rnal 'byor gdeng ldan pas// ser snas bcings pa'i rdzas rnams ni// g.yo sgyu'i thabs kyi nor blangs la// bla ma dkon mchog tshogs su 'bul// bla ma nges pa'i lung ldan gyis// de la gsang ba'i sku lnga byin// de phyir ma byin blangs na grol// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// gnas skabs 'brel ba'i lus yod pas// 'tsho ba'i bza' bgo dgos pa'i phyir// log 'tsho'i g.yo sgyu ma yin par// chos kyis 'tsho ba'i rdzas rnams btsal// de yang lam gyi rnal 'byor pas// bung ba bcud len zhen med ltar// khyim pa sun ni ma phyung bar// 'tsho ba'i yo byad tshod zin bya// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// lus la pho mo yod pa'i phyir// sems can las kyi chags spyod tshe// 'khor ba'i 'bras bu ma smin na// don zin bde ba grogs su che// de phyir snga phyi ma song pa'i// ye shes chos sku rang yin pas// de la skyon gyis mi gos phyir// thabs dang lta bas zin par bya// da yang blo gros dam pa nyon// bdag nyid ma yin gzhan dag la// chags sems tsam yang mi bya la// dam tshig sdom pa srung ba dang// rgyal rigs mo dang bslab srung dang// bdag po can gyi bud med ni// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig gi// nyams par byed pa'i bzhi yin phyir// ro myags ngu 'bod dmyal bar ltung// bag chags zhen pa'i rgyu yin pas// blta bas ma zin rtag tu spang// zhen med chos sku'i spyod par bshad// de phyir 'khor spangs rab tu gces// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'jig rten 'khor ba rdzun gyi chos// yod
28
1 med skyon la dam par blta// ma rig 'khrul par the tshom med// mi bden rdzun par shin tu smra// de yang blo gros dam pa nyon// 'du shes bsgyur nas rang 'dod kyis// mi chos bla ma'i rdzun sogs blos// rang sems bcos phyir don dang 'gal// de bzhin lce rmod dmyal bar ltung// de yang rang sems rtogs pa'i don// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// gnyis kas 'bras bu mi 'byin na// dug lnga rang grol rgyal ba'i thugs// rtogs la drang po ma bcos pa// sangs rgyas mdzad spyod de go bas// g.yo sgyu med pa dam pa'i don// de ltar rnal 'byor dam pa'i lam// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ gsang ba'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//// de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// ma bsgoms 'brel med bka' stsal pa// sems nyid bsgom du med pa'i dpe// nam mkha' bsgom du sems dang bral// de bzhin sems kyi sems bsgom du// chos nyid spyad pa'i yul las 'das// sems kyi gzhi shes bsgom mi dgos// don gnyis tshig tu 'byung ba'i phyir// tshig la don med zer ba 'khrul// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rgyun du 'bral med chos kyi sku// nyams myong med pa nyams kyi mchog/ ci yang yid la mi byed na// gol dang sgrib par ga la 'gyur// bsgom pa'i mchog tu de gsungs so// rnal 'byor spyod lam thams cad du// lta ba'i dam tshig chen po ni// ma nor ma bcos dam tshig gis// de rtogs de las mi 'da' bas// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dam yin// skye med don la sems zhugs pa'i// nam mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor de// de las mi 'da' dam tshig ni// rang rig chos sku dam pa'i mchog/ brjod pa med pa'i dam tshig yin// bsrung du med pa'i ngang du bsdam// de nyid dran pa'i rnal 'byor pas// spyod lam rnam bzhi gang byed kyang// 'ching bar mi 'gyur grol bar nges// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// snying po chos sku rang gsal don// ma bsgoms 'bral med ye shes klong// rang sems shes pa sna tshogs pa// ye shes las ni gzhan med pa// tha mal rang sems chos nyid ni// de yang mi 'gyur ngo bo ston// dag dang ma dag gzhi gcig phyir// dus dang spyod lam thams cad du// gnyid dang bar dor bsgom pa ni// da ltar wal le snang ba rnams// ma rtogs bar du 'khrul pa ste// rtogs na de nyid chos sku yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// thig le ma btsal lhun gyis grub// ye nas rang byung chos sku ni// yul nyid sems su mi bsgoms phyir// sgom pa po yang med par 'gyur// gang gis gang la bsams shing bsgom// de phyir gnas lugs bsgom du med// ma rtogs thabs kyis ci zhig
29
1 bya// dbang po rab kyis btsal du med// tha mal mi rtog gdams ngag med// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ bsgom du med par la bzla ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// dad ldan 'khor la phan don du// kun rig ston pa chos rje la// bden pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// 'bral med rkyen thub ting 'dzin gyis// ye shes bde ba rkyen thub dang// sdug bsngal zhi byed rkyen thub dang// btang snyoms lhag mthong rkyen thub dang// rmi lam klong thim rkyen thub dang// dug lnga rang grol rkyen thub dang// skye phyis mi len rkyen thub rnams/ kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// bde ba nang nas phyir bstan pa// nang gi zhi gnas bde ba ste// gang zag bdag med bde ba dang// chos la bdag med bde ba dang// 'jig rten mi g.yo'i bde ba yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// pho mo lus kyi bde ba dang// rang sems rtogs pa'i bde ba dang// thabs zin 'phrang gi bde ba dang// thabs med 'dod chags bde ba'o// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// phyi 'dzin longs spyod bde ba yang// zas nor 'khor gyi longs spyod dang// 'dod yon lnga la ci bder spyod// zhen pa'i dbang gis chog shes med// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// nang gi zhi gnas bde ba ni// gang zag bdag med 'gags pa ru// mi gol rkyen gyi gdams ngag gis// sgo lnga mi 'gag rang gsal la// yid la lhag mthong dran pas bzung// rkyen thub 'bral med ye shes yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// chos la bdag med bde ba ni// dbu ma sems tsam bsgom pa ste// der mi gol ba'i gdams ngag ni// bden gnyis sems su blo mi bsdu// rig pas mi gzhig rang sa la// yul med shes pa rang byung shes// yengs pa mi 'byung rkyen thub rnams// de phyir 'bral med ye shes yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'jig rten mi g.yo'i bde ba ni// bsam gtan gsum sogs bde ba de// zhen pa yod phyir 'khor ba'i rgyu// der mi gol ba'i gdams ngag ni// lung ldan rkyen gyi gdams ngag rgyun// shan phyed ngos zin la zlos phyir// bde ba zhen med rkyen thub pa'i// yid ches gdeng gis zin pa'i phyir// 'gal rkyen mi 'byung chos skur gsal// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// phyi 'dzin longs spyod yul la zhen// der mi gol ba'i gdams ngag ni// yul rig bar du bdag gzhan gyi// ngar 'dzin bden 'dzin dam par ni// snang bar zhen pa med pa'i phyir// phyi yi yengs pa'i rkyen rnams thub// de phyir snang ba chos kyi dbyings// rdzogs pa
30
1 chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ bde la zhen med ye shes su rkyen thub par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// sdug bsngal zhi byed bka' stsal pa// sems can kun la gnas pa yi// phyi yi sdug bsngal zhi gyur pa'i// lus kyi sdug bsngal nad yin te// bzhi brgya rtsa gcig 'du ba bzhi// mi bde sna tshogs bskyed par byed// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nang gi sdug bsngal bdag gzhan la// byams bral sdang 'phrad dogs pa dang// yod skyong med tshol zhen pa kun// phyi yi sdug bsngal yin par gsungs// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// rang lus na tsha bzod dka' ste// rkyen dbang mi gol gdams ngag ni// gang na blo yis ma bzung bar// bzod dka' rang r-ig chos skur shes// snga phyi ma btang da lta yi// bde sdug bdag kyang chos skur gsal// sdug bsngal rang zhi ye shes 'char// yi chad kha bzhi'i rkyen rnams thub// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// phyi yi sdug bsngal rnams bzhi la// zhen pa rang rgyud mi gol ba// yul sems bar do'i gdams ngag ni// nges don dran pas rkyen mi tshugs// sdug bsngal ye shes dang du shar// rnam rtog mi byed chos kyi sku// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag sdug bsngal phyi nang gnyis// rtsa ba ma rig blos byas te// lung ldan rkyen gyis ma rig 'bral// ye shes rang rig chos skur shes// sdug bsngal bya ba'i ming yang med// rang 'byung rtogs pas mngon sangs rgya// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ sdug bsngal zhi byed chos sku rkyen thub par bstan pa'i le'u ste sum bcu pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po yis// ma rig las byung btang snyoms la// lhag mthong rig pas bka' stsal pa// bde sdug ma dran btang snyoms ni// zhi gnas ma rig gti mug ste// gang la blo yang ma zhugs pas// dge sdig gnyis su lung ma bstan// de las bag tsam cha phra las// lung ma bstan pa rnam gsum byung// bde sdug skyed pa'i rgyur ni gsungs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// shes bzhin lung ma bstan du ni// mi gol ba yi gdams ngag ni// thog mar rang byung ngo shes nas// ma rig med phyir nges lung bstan// de phyir rang rig chos sku rtogs// btang snyoms lhag mthong rig par shar// kun gzh-i dag phyir rkyen thub pas// 'gyur med ye shes chos kyi sku// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// btang snyoms lhag mthong rang byung de// shes pa gsal la mi rtog pa// chos sku mi g.yo don gyis zin// de phyir lung ldan chos skur
31
1 gsal// gsal tsam nyid na rkyen thub phyir// rang byung thugs la 'gyur ba med// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nges pa'i lung bstan gdams ngag gis// dge sdig ma dran chos skur dran// de phyir lhag mthong rig pa la// thig le nyag gcig de la bya// rang byung snying po yul las 'das// sems kyi spyod yul ma yin phyir// rtogs pa'i chog la bsgom mi dgos// nor bu rin chen rnyed dang 'dra// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// tha ma shes pa btang snyoms 'di// kun bzang rgyal po'i dgongs par shes// de tshe yul sems gnyis las 'das// rang byung chos skur ji ltar gsal// de la 'gal ba'i skyon mi 'byung// 'dus ma byas ni nam mkha' 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ btang snyoms lhag mthong rig pas rkyen thub par bstan pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// rmi lam klong thim bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor dam pa gnyid byung tshe// rmi lam dge sdig lung ma bstan// bag chags mtshams sbyor ltas bstan pa'i// rmi lam sna tshogs byung dus su// ye shes klong thim shes par bya// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// tshe stod sngar byas gang rmis pa// bag chags rmi lam yin shes pas// de rjes mi gcod don dran phyir// bag chags rmi lam rang stong nas// ye shes klong thim rkyen thub tshe// 'di la ma mthong med ma myong// gang rmis pa yi mtshams sbyor bas// bag la nyal du shes pa'i phyir// kun brtags med pa'i lhag mthong gis// mtshams sbyor rang zhi rkyen rnams thug/ da yang rdo rje sem dpa' nyon// 'jig rten lhas byas lung bstan pa'i// rmi lam bzang ngan gang byung yang// bslu ba'i bdud du shes pa'i phyir// dam par gtad med gang bzhag pa// bslu med rkyen thub chos skur gsal// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rnal 'byor dam pa gnyid log tshe// dge sdig lung ma bstan pa'i tshe// gang dmigs gang yang ma bsam par// chos nyid ngang la gnas par bya// gang yang rtog pa ma zhugs na// bzang ngan zhen pa rang zhi ste// ye shes klong thim rkyen rnams thub// de phyir nges don gdams ngag che// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ gnyid ye shes klong thim du rkyen thub par bstan pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i dad ldan la/ kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// dug lnga rang grol bka' stsal pa// nyi shar mun sgrib med pa bzhin// lung ldan ma rig rtsad gcod nas// ngo bo rig pa chos skur gsal// ma rig med pas gti mug sangs// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ldum bu
32
1 sad kyi bsad pa ltar// zhe sdang yul med don shes pas// log gnon dran pa bsal ba'i phyir// zhe sdang rang grol rkyen rnams thub// rmi lam 'dod chags 'chal med bzhin// snga phyir ma song dus de ru// pho mo 'dod chags ci spyod kyang// de tsam nyid na skyon mi gos// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ri bo chen po'i khar phyin ltar// nga rgyal chen po'i rtog pa 'chang// lhag mthong rig pa'i ye shes kyis// nga rgyal rang sar rkyen thub grol// lta ba ma nor gdeng gi 'phrang// gol sgrib med pa'i chos sku la// phrag dog rang sar rkyen thub phyir// ba mo la ni nyi shar 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nges don shes pas gti mug 'joms// rang rig dran pas zhe sdang brlag/ bde ba zhen med 'dod chags bral// yid ches 'dzin med nga rgyal grol// chos sku dran pas phrag dog dag/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// don gyi ngo bo gnas lugs la// sgro skur gnyis kyi skyon med pas// dug lnga kun brtags rang sar grol// de phyir chos sku snying por gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ dug lnga rang grol rkyen thub bstan pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// bar dor rkyen thub bka' stsal pa// nges don rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dus kyi tha ma byung ba'i tshe// snang ba skye dang mched pa dang// snang ba 'gyur zhing thob pa'i dus// lung ldan nges pa'i gdams ngag gis// bar dor skye ba mi len pa'o// rkyen thub 'bras bu sangs rgyas 'byung// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// snang ba 'gyur zhing spang pa'i dus// bar dor lus gsum mi len pa'o// nges don gdams ngag don dran pas// gzhi gnas ma rig med pa'i phyir// rkyen bzhis ma bskyed lus mi len// shes pa chos sku 'gyur med brtan// mngon shes drug dang rjes dran drug/ sangs rgyas sa yi yon tan kun// thogs pa med par dus gcig rdzogs// de phyir rkyen thub sa zin pas// ma rig sangs la ye shes rgyas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang// sangs rgyas yon tan kun rdzogs phyir// 'gro don gzugs sku dus gcig 'byung// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de tshe ye shes snang ba las// bag chags bral bas chags sdang med// snang ba med pas zhen pa grol// rig pa gsal ba chos skur shes// lus can gang yang med pa'i phyir// pho mo ma mthong mngal mi 'jug/ de phyir skye ba mi len nges// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nges pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas ni// rnam dag chos sku gcig gcig la// nges don 'bras bu logs na med// drang don sangs rgyas grangs mang yang// mthar thug
33
1 chos sku yin pa'i phyir// bsgrub pa bas kyang rtogs pa gces// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ srid pa bar ma do la skye ba phyi ma mi len par bstan pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o//// de nas kun rig rgyal po la// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis yang gsol pa// the tshom gegs rnams bsal ba'i phyir// gdams ngag rnam dbye ji ltar dbye// 'khrul pa log pa'i rtags chen gang// thig le'i la shan ji ltar dbye// nges par the tshom ji ltar bsal// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu yi// dbye ba rnam pa drug drug gi// dbye ba bstan gyis legs par nyon// lta ba'i ngo bo shes rab ste// mos pa'i blo yis gang bzung ba// dbye ba rang gnas ngo bo ni// stong par khyab pas nam mkha' 'dra// nges tshig chos skur lta ba yin// gol sa ma rig rtag chad gnyis// skyon ni yul sems bsre byed pa// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sgom pa'i ngo bo mi rtogs pa// dbye ba mthun pa 'bral med de// til gyi mar me dud med 'dra// nges tshig dbang po ma yengs pa// gol sa bying dang rgod pa'o// skyon ni nan gyis glen bsgom byed// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// spyod pa'i tshul ni ma bcos pa// dbye ba rig gsang mthun pa'i thabs// tshom med glang chen chur 'jug 'dra// nges tshig shugs 'byung blang dor med// gol sa rang rgyud nyon mongs spyod// skyon ni chos brgyad yul la zhen// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'bras bu nges pa'i gdeng zin pas// dbye na gnas skabs mthar thug 'grub// rin chen rgyan gyi yon tan 'dra// nges tshig bslu med rang yid ches// gol sa 'bad pa don med 'khyams// skyon ni phyis 'byung re dogs blo// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de dag dbye ba tha dad kyang// ma rig rmongs pa bstan pa la// ngo bo rang byung nyid 'di las// gzhan du g.yos pa rdul tsam med// rdzogs pa chen po blta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ gdams ngag gi dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// 'khrul ldog rtags bdun ngas bshad kyis// legs par zung la yid kyi nyon// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi shes pas// 'khor 'das glo bur 'khrul par shes// re dogs med pa gzhi shes rtags// mtha' drug rkyen bzhi 'dzin med pas// yid ches gdeng gi don zin nas// lhan cig ma rig log pa'i rtags// thog ma'i rang byung ngo shes pas// dus gsum gcig tu shes pa'i phyir// 'khrul pa'i dus las log pa'i rtags// yul ni ma nges sna tshogs
34
1 kyang// chos brgyad zhen pa med pa'i phyir// kun brtags ma rig log pa'i rtags// thag pa rang du shes tsam na// sbrul du 'dzin pa rang sar grol// dpe las don du log pa'i rtags// rdzun la bden par mi 'dzin pas// bsgom du med pa rang sar grol// 'khrul pa'i ngo bo log pa'i rtags// ma rig med phyir bag chags bral// blang dor gnyis sogs don dran pas// lugs su 'jug pa log pa'i rtags// rang gi sems la dbang thob pas// shes bzhin skye ba drang don phyir// skye shi'i sdug bsngal log pa'i rtags// shes rig rang sems snying po ste// glo bur ma yin ye gnas pas// shes rig dus gsum mi 'gyur phyir// chad pa'i 'khrul pa log pa'i rtags// rang byung ngo bo nyid kyi sku// dngos po yul las 'das pa de// shes rig rang sems snying po ste// kha dog dbyibs med gnyug mar rtogs// rtag par 'dzin pa'i 'khrul log rtags// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// 'jig rten 'khrul pa de dag dang// ma rig dbang gi log lta ba// nam langs mun pa med pa bzhin// de nyid rtogs pas 'khrul pa sangs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ 'khor bar 'khrul pa log pa'i rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste so drug pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// myang 'das 'khrul pa log pa dang// yul sems tha dad mi 'dod cing// ye nas gnyug ma'i gzhi shes pas// 'gro don snying rje mi 'bral na// nyan thos 'khrul pa log pa'i rtags// snang ba sems su mi sdud cing// don dam skad cig mi 'dod pas// 'phel 'grib med pa'i don rtogs na// sems tsam 'khrul pa log pa'i rtags// bden pa gnyis su mi rtog cing// yang dag stong par mi 'dod pas// rang byung ye shes 'gyur med de// dbu ma'i 'khrul pa log pa'i rtags// yul med sems su mi 'dod cing// sngags dang yig 'bru lhar mi skyed// re dogs dngos grub mi 'tshol bas// kri yog 'khrul pa log pa'i rtags// bden pa dbyer med mi 'dod cing// ting 'dzin rim gyis mi bsgom pas// rtsol ba med pa'i don rtogs pas// ma hAr 'khrul pa log pa'i rtags// mkha' klong rol par mi 'dod cing// snying po dran tsam lhar mi bsgom// ngang 'jog mi dgos don rtogs pas// a nur 'khrul pa log pa'i rtags// de rtags brgyad ldan skyes bu ni// mi yi lus la sangs rgyas sras// rig 'dzin gdung 'tshob sprul pa'i sku// de yi yon tan brjod mi langs// rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying/ nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud las/ theg pa 'og ma pa'i 'khrul pa log pa'i rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste so bdun
35
1 pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la/ kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// phyi nang ma bcos mya ngan 'das// myang 'das don ni chos kyi sku// chos kyi dbyings na chos sku'i 'od// snying po 'bras bu ye shes sku// snying po kun la khyab cing 'dus// thugs kyi nying khu yin pa'i phyir// thig le 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir// kun bzang rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs// tshig tu ma bkod thugs la brgyud// don gyi gting phyin bstan pa'i phyir// tshig nyung don la rdzogs pa yis// thig le la shan dbye ba ni// mtshan nyid btags pa'i thig le dang// gsang sngags gzhi yi thig le dang// rdzogs chen spyi yi thig le dang// yang ti thig le nyag gcig dang// re re la'ang bzhi bzhi ste// ngo bo dpe dang gtan tshigs kyis// 'gro sa la shan dbye ba yang// rtsal gyi sgo nas gsum bstan pa// snang ba chos kyi dbyings las
