le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// rig pa ma bslad chos sku yi// rang bzhin ngo bo nyid kyi sku// rgyu rkyen ma bskyed 'gyur ba med// 'dus ma byas pa'i nam mkha' 'dra// de yi rtogs tshul ye shes te// bsgom sgrin sgro skur ma btags pa// kun bzang rang rig chos skur rtogs// ri po ta la'i nyi shar 'dra// de yis de nyid mtshon pa'i dang// mtha' dbus med pas nam mkha' 'dra// rnam rtog 'joms pas rdo rje 'dra// skye ba med pas a dang 'dra// de yi nges pa'i gtan tshigs ni// rang byung 'khor bar 'khyams ma myong// de rtogs da lta nyid du yang// mtha' bral mngon gyur bden pa mthong// de yi ldog thabs nges pa ni// mthun dang mi mthun gnyis log pas// gol sgrib skyon gyis ma gos phyir// sems las ma byung chos skur gsungs// de yi mtshan nyid nges pa ni// gang dang 'dra med yin pa med// yin ni da lta'i shes pa la// de yi don kun gnas pa'i don// de phyir 'bral ba med pa'i mchog/ la bzlas spang blang med shes pas// skyon yon thams cad med par dag/ de phyir dus 'dir 'bras bu 'grub// phyi mar sangs rgyas smos ci dgos// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// chos dbyings chos sku gcig gi ngang// rang byung rig pa'i ye shes de// nyi zla gzas zin dpe bzhin du// don kun dus gcig yon tan rdzogs// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ rig pa ma bslad chos kyi skur bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad
170
1 pa'o//// kun rig ston pas yangagasungs pa// ma bsgoms 'bral med bstan pa'i don// dang po kun gzhi shan phye la// bar du chos sku ngos bzung ba// tha ma la zlos bden pa mthong// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dang po rang rig kun gzhi ni// snga phyi rtogs dang chos sku ru// lung ldan bla mas shan phye la// tha mas brten bcas ma bsgribs pa'i// mtshan nyid bzhi ldan chos skur shes// gol sa bzhi chod gdeng dang ldan// de phyir lhag mthong nges pa rnyed// ye nas gnas pa'i rang byung de// ngo shes don dang 'bral med phyir// rgyun du gnas pas sangs rgyas sa// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag bsgom pa'i dbye ba ni// gsal ba mi rtog mi g.yo ba// dbye ba rnam pa dgu dgur ni// rgyun du 'bral med gtan la 'bebs// de dag rtsa ba mdor bsdu na// sgo lnga gsal ba mar me 'dra// rig pa mi g.yo mtsho gting 'dra// mi rtog bya ba btang ba 'dra// de gsum chos nyid gcig la rdzogs// gang mthong dran pa ma 'khrul ba// chos sku ngos zin don ldan pas// de phyir thig le nyag gcig la// ma 'dus pa ni gcig kyang med// rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa'i yang snying// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud rin po che gser gyi yang zhun las/ rgyun tu 'bral med kyi bsgom pa ngos gzung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// rgyun du 'bral med rig spyod ni// dus ni bzhi gsum gsungs pa yang// spyi yi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir// tshig tu bden te don las gol// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ye shes rang shar gdams ngag gis// yul ni ma yengs dran pa de// ma 'khrul rig pa chos skur shes// de phyir gdams ngag dus 'dir rtogs// mngon gyur sangs rgyas da lta nyid// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dang po rig spyod dbye ba'i don// rgyu dang gol sa gdams ngag dang// nyams dang la bzla 'bras bu ste// re re la ni drug drug tu// phye la bstan gyis yid la zung// bde ba'i ye shes rnam gsum gyi// nang gi bde ba rkyen thub grangs// blta med bzhi gnas 'gog pa la// bdag med mi g.yo rnam gsum gyi// rang yan lhag mthong mi brjed gzung// mtha' bral ye gsal gdeng gis zin// bdag nyid gzhi la med par shes// de nyid bde gsal ye shes sku// 'du 'dzi longs spyod bde ba ni// yo byad rnam gsum ldan pa ste// 'dod yon lnga la rang rgyud zhen// gang mthong ma 'khrul don shes pas// gang yang myong ba rig par shes// bdag gzhan gzhi la ma grub pas// bde ba longs spyod chos nyid rgyan// pho mo bde ba'i grangs bstan pa// 'gro ba bzang mor yid chags pa// thabs dang rang rgyud chags spyod
171
1 gol// snga phyir ma nges don zin pa'i// de tshe bde ba'i mthar ma ltung// pho mo gzhi la grub pa med// lus bde longs spyod rig pa'i sku// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag bde ba rnam gsum yang// spyod bde don dngos spyad gyur kyang// gnas skabs 'brel yod mthar thug med// de phyir gdeng zin kun gyis spyod// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ bde ba ye shes su rkyen thub par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung ba gsum// de la phyi lus sdug bsngal grangs// nad ni bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi la// ye 'grog 'khang pa rnam gsum yin// gang na lhag mthong don gyis zin// de tshe mtha' 'bral chos skur mthong// lus dang na tsha gzhi la med// sdug bsngal de nyid sprul skur shar// sems kyi sdug bsngal grangs gsungs pa// chags sdang rnam gnyis yin pa'i phyir// gol sar skyon bzhi dam par 'dzin// mi gzhig mi bcom dran pas zin// gang la zhen tsam rig pas zin// de tsam nyid na gzhi la med// de tshe sdug bsngal sprul par shes// spyi yi sdug bsngal rnam bzhi'o// ma rig rkyen bzhi bskyed pa yi// nyon mongs bag chags bsags pas gol// snga phyi med shes gdams ngag gis// mtshan nyid bzhi ldan nyams su myong// gzhi la snga phyi don la med/ phyir 'bras bu chos kyi sku// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sdug bsngal nyid kyang bde ba'i klong// don la ye shes 'du 'bral med// da lta'i rig pa 'di nyid yin// de phyir sdug bsngal bde ba'i klong// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ sdug bsngal zhi byed chos skur rkyen thub par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// btang snyoms rang bzhin rkyen thub grangs// le lo snyoms las lung ma bstan// btang snyoms shes pa ma rig bsgribs// shan phyed ngos zin yid ches pas// rang rig 'bral med nyams dang ldan// ma rig med phyir btang snyoms med// lhag mthong 'bras bu bden pa mthong// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gnyid ni chos sku klong thim gyis// bag nyal gzhi gnas ma rig pas// rmi lam rnam gsum yul la zhen// ldog ka sad dus de nyid shes// de tsam nyid na nyams myong gsal// don la rmi lam grub med rtogs// 'bras bu mi rtog chos skur shar/ kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ btang snyoms gnyid ye shes klong thim du bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// kun rig rgyal pos yang gsungs pa// gti mug rang grol bstan pa'i grangs// ma rig shes gzhi lung ma bstan// gang yang mi shes gti mug sems// lung ldan sgron mas don bstan pas//
172
1 rang rig chos sku yid la bstar// gzhi dang phrad pas mun pa brlag/ 'bras bu chos nyid thams cad mkhyen// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// zhe sdang rang grol grangs bstan pa// yul ngan kha dog smra ba la// zhe sdang sems dkrugs bzod pa nyams// mi bsam yul gyi rjes mi gcod// de dus rtag chad mtha' bral nyams// bdag gzhan gzhi la grub pa med// 'bras bu rang rig sprul skur shar// nga rgyal rengs byed grangs bstan pa// gzhan dag brdeg bsad smra ba las// nga bden rmongs pa ched du byed// gang yang bden med don dran pas// de nyid rig par shes pa'i nyams// tshig gis ches chung gzhi la med// don ldan nga rgyal chos skur shar// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// phrag dog rang grol grangs bstan pa// gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la// g.yo sgyus gzhan la thabs kyis smod// bdag dang gzhan med chos kyi sku// phrag dog rang grol chos skur myong// de tsam nyid na bdag gzhan med// g.yo sgyu ma bral longs spyod rgyan// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dngos po ma 'khrul gnas lugs la// tshor ba bde sdug ci byung yang// de dus chos skur nyams su myong// de tshe yul dang 'brel med shes// de phyir rkyen thub bsgom mi dgos// rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa'i yang snying kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ dug lnga rang grol du bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// srid pa'i bar do rnam lnga la// ma rig 'khrul pa'i bar do dang// kun brtags dge ba'i bar do dang// gnas 'gyur lha yi bar do dang// rnam shes rlung zhon bar do dang// mngon gyur ye shes bar do'o// ma rig 'khrul pa'i bar do ni// rgyu ni ma rig rnam gsum ste// rkyen ni chags sdang gnyis kyis gol// gol sa bar dor lus gsum 'dus// sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong// skye rgas sdug bsngal zad du med// de las thar cing ldog 'dod pas// kun brtags dge rtsa 'dir byas pas// dge bcu sbyin sogs dad pas spyad// phyi mar 'bras bu 'dod pa'i blos// rgyu mthun bag chags mthu brtas pas// lha dang mi yi go 'phang tsam// smon lam dbang gis mtha' btsan kyang// dge ba'i stegs zad 'khor bar 'khyams// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gnas 'gyur lha yi bar do la// rtogs dang lha gsal dus mnyam nas// sku gsum gcig la gcig tshang nas// 'bras bu'i sangs rgyas dus de nyid// ma rtogs lha bsgom rU trar skye// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rnam shes rlung zhon bar do la// phyi nang rlung gi bde goms pas// phag mo la sogs 'pho ba bdun// 'od gsal ye shes skur 'dod pa// thabs lam yin phyir nges don
173
1 min// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// mngon gyur ye shes bar do la// rgyu ni lung ldan gdams ngag ste// byin rlabs rjes dran rnam drug gis// ma rig sangs la rig pa rgyas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras bur ldan// 'gro don gzugs sku shugs la 'char// btsal ba med par don rnams grub// rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud/ rin po che gser gyi yang zhun las/ srid pa bar do la skye ba phyis mi len par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de ltar ma rtogs byin brlabs pas// dbu ma man chad lta sgom ste// 'khor 'das chos kun sems su bsdus// rig pas rtag chad mtha' bsal te// mi dmigs tsam la bsgom pa'i thabs// bying rgod gnyis kyi skyon bsal la// ting nge mer re rang gsal tsam// yang nas yang du goms par byed// mthun 'jug thabs kyi spyod pa yang// 'og ma'i chos dang sgo bstun phyir// dge sdig shan mdangs phyed par spyod// de tshe don gyis zin par bya// lta sgom spyod pa 'dzom pa'i tshe// 'bras bu tshogs gnyis nam rdzogs na// sgrib gnyis sbyangs nas sangs rgyas 'dod// de las lhag pa'i chos med zer// ri dwags smig rgyu bsnyegs ltar 'khrul// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// thabs kyis rig pa byin brlabs pa// sman dang yig 'bru dbang gi dus// rtsa dang thig le bde bsgom pas// shes pa 'gyur nas bde la zhen// de phyir mi grol shin tu 'ching// mi rtog thabs kyi bde 'dod gol// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ 'og ma'i bsgom pa gol bar bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// lta med gzhi gnas zhen pa la// bdud byung bar chad zhen las byung// zil gnon gdams ngag ngas bshad nyon// rnal 'byor lta med nyams zhen pa// bdud kyi cho 'phrul mngon shes 'byung// de tshe lta sgom spyod nyams bdud// bar du bcad nas 'khor bar 'khyams// de bzlog don du gdams ngag gis// bco brgyad yon tan chen po ni// zil gnon rtogs dang 'bras bu yis// don ldan nges pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// lta ba'i bdud ni rnam bzhi ste// snang ba 'od dang grag pa sgra// 'jigs pa gzugs dang bslu ba rdzun// re re la ni drug drug tu// rgyu dang zhugs pa nyes dmigs dang// zil gnon rtags dang 'bras bur gsungs// snang ba 'od gyi bdud byung na// lta ba mun las snang 'byung bas// dge sdig mthong bas snying rje zhugs// 'gro don bya mno ting 'dzin btang// dngos med lhag mthong mi g.yo dran// gzhi la med pas gzha' tshon 'dra// dmyal ba'i gnas kyang sangs rgyas zhing// de
174
1 yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon/ grag pa sgra yi bdud byung na// mkha' la sgra dang chos ston 'byung// dga' bas ngoms zhing ting 'dzin btang// gdeng bral bsdu zhing bdud dbang song// bka' 'gal chos brgyad 'khor bar ltung// lta ba'i gdang zin sgra dang bral// sgra snyan rtags med rjes mi 'brang// tsher lhang gsung gi 'khor lo bde// 'jigs pa gzugs kyi bdud byung na// rmi lam dngos su 'jigs pa'i gzugs// mi dga' don bral mo chog byed// sems ngan tshe thung yi chad ltung// snang gzugs gzhi la med par shes// snying po med shes nyam mi nga// de nyid thub drug sprul skur shes// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bslu ba rdzun gyi bdud byung na// dus gsum nyes legs ston pa 'byung// bden dang mi bden tha ma rdzun// mngon shes rdugs pas zhe sdang skye// tshig las 'das phyir rdzun ma grub// rmi lam bzhin du 'khrul par shes// don rtogs ci smras rgyal ba'i bka'// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ lta ba'i bdud zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags dang 'bral bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// bsgom pa'i bdud ni rnam bzhi yi// bying ba gsal ba'i bdud byung na// don med nan tan 'bad nas bsgom// myos pa'i dbang gis gsal ba bying// gnyen po gsal ba'i don dang bral/ gnyid gsum bsres pas gti mug brlag/ chos nyid klong du gnyid thim shes// sangs rgyas ye shes klong du bying// rmugs pa bde ba'i bdud byung na// lung ldan chos sku ngos ma zin// shes pa rmun po lhag mthong med// bsgom pa byas kyang gti mug 'phel// rang rig dran pas ye shes gsal// lta bas zin phyir bde bar shar// 'bras bu ye shes 'gyur med klong// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rgod pa mi rtog bdud byung na// gdams ngag med phyir 'dus par dga'// don btang nas ni mi chos byed// spong sdud zhen pa sna tshogs byed// snga phyi rig pa'i don zin phyin// ba mor nyi shar bzhin du stongs// gdeng zin chos dbyings gnas kyi mchog/ 'phro ba mi g.yo'i bdud byung na// don la goms par ma byas pas// rig tshor dran pa phra mo rgyu// don med rkun bu yang yang ldang// mi brjed dran pa'i gzungs kyis zin// rnam rtog rang zhi rig pa gsal// thams cad chos sku 'bras bu mchog/ kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ sgom pa'i bdud zil gyis non pa'i rtags dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// bya ba 'du 'dzi longs spyod bdud// nyams dgar zhen pa gnas kyi bdud// bslab pa'i yon tan g.yeng ba'i bdud// 'khor ngan sems
175
1 dkrugs bdud dang ni// de dag spyod pa'i bdud bzhir gsungs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'du 'dzi longs spyod bdud dbye na// man ngag med par tshul 'chos byed// mi rnams smon 'dod gzhan sems 'dzin// don bor bdag 'dzin phrag dog ltung// de dag dgrar shes zhen pa chung// bu bzhin chags med don gyis zin// longs spyod rang grol rol par rtogs// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// zhen chags gnas bdud dbye ba ni// thos chung mkhas ches nyams dga' brtsig/ bkra shis 'dre med lha yod zer// 'dre brten mthu yod gzhan la bsdigs// gnas la ma chags nges med shes// bdag gzhan gzhi la med par rtogs// gang du 'dug pa 'og min gnas// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// yon tan g.yeng bdud dbye ba ni// rig pa lnga ldan bkur sti zhen// don bor rang don rang rgyud gol// zhen log dran zin zil gyis mnan// bdud med ye shes skul mar shes// g.yeng bas bdag gzhan chos skur grub// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'khor ngan sems dkrugs bdud dbye na// lta dman 'khor la gdung drags pas// 'gran sems mchog shes med par 'dod// dad log sgro skur zhe sdang skye// gdung sems bskyungs la 'brel ba gcad// bdud nyid chos skur shes pa las// spong zhing dor du rdul tsam med// rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa'i yang snying/ kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ spyod pa'i bdud zil gyis non pa'i rtags dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// nyams kyi bdud drug don bstan pa// mkha' 'gro'i lung ston bdud byung na// khyod ni ma 'dug phan gdags zer// 'dod pa snying zhugs zhen pa tshol// mi 'grub dka' ba sna tshogs byed// zhen pa nyid nas 'dod pa stongs// lung ston bslu ba rdzun du shes// gzhi la med shes re dogs med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nyams myong zhen pa'i bdud byung tshe// mi rtog zhen pa'i bde ba 'byung// 'phel 'grib yod pas ma nges pa// ngos ma zin pas lung ma bstan// lhag mthong dran pa'i gdeng dang ldan// don la 'gyur med nam mkha' bzhin// dam par lta med sgrib gnyis dag/ zhe 'dod tshul 'chos bdud byung tshe// gdams ngag med par bsgom tshul ston// dad can glen pa thabs kyis bslu// chags chung tshul 'chos chos par 'ches// gzhi nyid ma bcos dran pa gces// zhe 'dod med na tshul 'chos bral// 'dod med gdeng ldan 'bras bu'i mchog/ de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// brkam chags bdo ba'i bdud byung na// 'dod chags dbang la byang chub ni// rang gi zhen pas 'dod chags srid//
176
1 don du ma shes byang mi chub// rang rig don ldan dbang mi dgos// 'dod spyad rkyen thub chos skur shes// bogs med ye shes sangs rgyas yin// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yon tan phrag dog zhe sdang byed// de la lan 'debs rmongs pa ni// mkhas la skur 'debs dmyal bar lhung// gzhi rtogs don la skur dang bral// zhe sdang rang grol chos nyid rtogs// de nyid dus na bdud med shes// nga rgyal sgro 'dogs bdud byung tshe// gang zag smad phyir chos la smod// ches chung byad cing bka' rkun byed// bsod nams ches chung dmyal bar ltung// man ngag gsang thub zil gyis mnan// yid ches rang rig don gyis zin// da lta nyid du bden pa mthong// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag bdud kyi dbye ba yang// lta med rnams la 'byung ba las// lung ldan kun gyi yon tan te// sangs rgyas chos ni bco brgyad yin// rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa'i yang snying/ kun tu bzang po ye shes klung gi rgyud rin po che gser gyi yang zhun las/ nyams gyi bdud kyi rtags dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// kun rig ston pas bdag la gson// rnal 'byor nyams su myong ba'i bka'// don dang mthun par bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i don dgongs nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nyams myong rim pa rnam bzhi ste// snang ba chos dbyings nyams myong dang// rang rgyud zil gnon nyams myong dang// nges lung spyod pa'i nyams myong dang// lta ba gdeng zin nyams myong ngo// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// snang ba chos dbyings nyams myong ni// bya ba btang ba'i mi 'dra ste// mthong snang gzugs sgra la sogs pa// gang mthong ci dran cir snang yang// brtag dpyad ma byas gyi na tsam// yul ni bun ne long 'dug kyang// spong sdud zhen par ma song na// chos dbyings gdeng ldan nyams kyi mchog/ de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang rgyud nyon mongs zil non rtags// bsgom thabs skyod dang bcos pa'i thabs// thun tshad nyams dang rnam nga ste// bsgom thabs lta ba'i rgyun la bsgom// skyon ni bying dang rgod pa ste// bcos thabs rab 'bring tha ma yis// thun tshad nyams kyi tshod dang sbyar// de don nges par la bzla na// gser 'gyur rtsi yis thebs pa bzhin// rtogs dang mi rtogs thams cad du// rang sems lta ba'i chos nyid gsal// rang rgyud zil gyis non pa'i nyams// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de don mthar thug rim pa'i don// gos kyi 'jam rtsub sna tshogs dang// zas kyi ro mchog gang myong ba// gang dran mthong bral chos skur shes// de tsam nyid na ye shes shar// yul nyid ma yin gang dran
177
1 pa// chos skur shes pas yul dang bral// de tsam yul dang rig pa gnyis// gnas skabs mthar thug 'brel pa med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rtogs pa mngon gyur gdeng gi nyams// g.yo dang goms pa brtan pa ni// cig car rim gyis 'byung ba ni// shes rab blo yi khyad par las// lus ngag yid kyi nyams rtags kun// rnal 'byor pa la nges par 'byung// de nyid rnal 'byor nyams kyi mchog/ kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ rnal 'byor nyams su myong ba'i bka' rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// la zlo spyod pa'i bka' rtags ni// 'khor la bshad kyi yid kyis nyon// kho na nyid dang sgro 'dogs gcod// rtogs pas gzhig dang ye shes spyod// gdeng ldan rnams kyis spyad par bya// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// lus kyi de kho na spyod pa// rgyal po gtan ma zin pa bzhin// lus nang chos sku rgyun du gnas// de phyir mi 'bral gzungs dang ldan// ngag gi de kho spyod chen ni// dpe ni dag pa'i brtul zhugs bzhin// nges pa'i don gyis skyon bral bas// ngag tu ma brjod chos skur gsal// sems kyi de kho spyod pa ni// nags kyi ri dwags bag phebs bzhin// shes rab rnam gsum thag chod pas// lhag mthong rig pa'i gdeng gis zin// chos kyi de kho dmigs pa ni// nor rnyed gsang ni thub pa bzhin// gdeng ldan nyams kyi gsang thub pas// nges don mchog gi dngos grub thob// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ de kho na nyid la dmigs pa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// phyi yi sgro 'dogs gcod pa ni// dred mo gdos kyis btags pa bzhin// yul dang 'bral med chos skur shes// snang bas mi gnod phan mi nus// nang gi sgro 'dogs gcod pa ni// mi shes slar la mi ldog bzhin// mtha' bral nges pa'i gdeng gis zin// rang rig bde mthong phyir mi ldog/ gnyis ka'i sgro 'dogs chod spyod pa// gnyid sad 'jigs pa bral ba bzhin// ma rig sangs phyir yul dang bral// de phyir yid ches gdeng gis zin// lung gi sgro 'dogs chos spyod ni// nor stor slar la rnyed pa bzhin// drang don mdo rgyud sun bton nas// nges don rnyed pas chos skur rtogs/ kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ sgro 'dogs chod pa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// zas nor dgra gnyen rtog gzhom phyed// ye shes spyod pa bstan du gsol// kun rig ston pas thugs gsol te// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// zas kyi rtog pa gzhom pa'i phyir// khyi phag
178
1 bzhin du gtsang dme med// don zin rtog pa bcos gyur na// yon tan drug ldan spyod pa'i mchog/ gos gyi rtog pa bcom pa'i phyir// smyon pa bzhin du ngan dgu gon// gnyen sdang yon tan lnga ldan phyir// chags med yon tan mchog tu ldan// gnyen gyi rtog pa gzhom pa'i phyir// ngo tsha med par chags spyod dang// gnyen la sdang ba byas gyur na// 'khor ngan bdud bcom bde ba 'phel// dgra yi rtog pa gzhom pa'i phyir// gri bo gshed la 'khor ba bzhin// chags sdang gzhi la med par shes// dgra nyid chos skur shes par bya// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag spyod pa gang spyod dang// rigs spyod rgyun du bya ba ni// bram ze'i dam tshig 'gal ba'i phyir// lung ldan kun gyis byar mi rung// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ rtog pa gzhom pa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// kun rig ston pas yang gsungs pa// gzhi shes blo dngos gcig pa dang// brtul zhugs mchog dang bgegs med pa'i// ye shes rang shar ngas shad kyis// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams yid kyi nyon// lung ldan gdams ngag gzhi shes pas// ngo bo nyid la blo ldan phyir// gang yang chos skur rang gsal bas// 'dus ma byas pa'i nam mkha' 'dra// blo dngos gcig par shes pa yis// gang mthong nyid 'khrul med shes phyir// snang mthong gang dran chos skur shes// smig rgyu nam mkhar shes pa 'dra// brtul zhugs mchog gi spyod pa ni// mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu// chags sdang lnga la longs spyad kyang// lta ba rtogs pa'i grangs su 'gyur// lung rigs mi 'gal rgyud gnas dang// 'bol zhing zhi la 'jam 'dod pas// nges pa'i gdams ngag ma go na// mkhas kyang rmongs pa snying re rje// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bgegs med ye shes rang shar ba// rang gi rnam rtog yod kyi bar// bgegs kyi mtha' la zad pa med// dngos su med phyir 'khrul pa'i blo// mu stegs can la 'dre yod phyir// 'drer 'dzin skye bo ma rig pa// mo ma'i rdzun gyis glen pa bslus// dam pa kun gyis 'dre sun bton// yul dang gol sa chod gyur na// 'dre med rig pa chos skur shes// gzhi la lha 'dre med rtogs pas// phan gnod bya ba ming yang med// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag ye shes rang shar ba// kun brtags zad na 'dre rnams stongs// 'dre ni nyid 'khrul yin pa'i phyir// ri bong rwa la yod rtog 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa'i yang snying kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud/ rin po che gser gyi yang zhun las/ ye shes rang shar gyi spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pas yang gsungs
179
1 pa// dam tshig ltung med ngas bshad nyon// rtogs thabs lnga yis ma nyams na// rang sems mi rtog lung mi ldan// 'khor bar 'khyams kyang 'jigs pa med// da bu+u la ni las nor 'dra// ched du ma byas drug nyams na// byas pa thams cad mi 'grub cing// 'dir sdug phyi mar dmyal bar ltung// rgyal pos chab bsal mi ngan 'dra// bsrung ba'i dam tshig lnga nyams na// ma rungs las rnams spyad pa'i phyir// ma rig mun pa ma sol pas// rang gi mig ni rang bton 'dra// srang ba'i dam tshig bzhi nyams na// 'og ma'i sems bskyed sdom zhig pas// kha na ma tho rnam gsum ltung// btson rar chud pa'i mi ngan 'dra// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag dmigs kyis dbye ba ni// ltung ba'i sgo dgur ltung nges kyis// de yi sdug bsngal smos thag chad// las kyis tshe tshad brjod mi langs// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ ma rtogs pa'i dam tshig nyams pa'i ltung ba'i sgo bstan pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// de nas kun rig rgyal po yis// mthar thug ye shes 'bras bu sogs// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi don ched du// mngon gyur sangs rgyas bka' stsal pa// lus med ye shes sgo lnga yis// sngar ma mthong ba'i zhing khams su// ye shes mig gi dus gcig mthong// 'char nub med pa'i nyi zla shar// zos pa med pa'i ro mchog myong// ma bsams pa yi dran pa la// mi brjed pa yi gzungs dang ldan// bsgrubs pa med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung// rkyen dbang mi 'gyur yul gcig rnyed// sangs rgyas kun dang dgongs pa gcig/ btsal med 'gro don da lta byed// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// rnam smin las med ye shes sku// rig pa gsal la kha mig can// sngar ma mthong ba'i chos dbyings la// zhing khams sangs rgyas ye shes klong// chos sku rig pa 'char nub med// rang sems rtogs pas chos skur shar// ting 'dzin zas ni nyams su bsten// ro mchog nyams myong chos skur shes// de la bsgom bsgrub bya mi dgos// 'khor 'das gnyis su ma bsams pa'i// lhag mthong dran pa'i ye shes la// mi brjed gzungs ldan rig pa'i sku// gang dran rang rig kun khyab phyir// dus gsum skye 'gag med pa yi// 'bras bu bar dor ye shes ldan// ma rig bag chags shes pa'i phyir// rkyen bzhis bskyed pa'i dbang mi 'gyur// spyir chib sa la nges par 'gro// lhun grub mngon 'gyur dus der 'grub// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// dgongs pa kun bzang nga dang mnyam// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan gzugs sku 'byung// gza' skar gzugs rnyan me long bzhin// ma btsal lhun gyis chos skur grub// de nyid don ldan da lta byas// ye shes lus la rig pa'i
180
1 thugs// ye shes rang shar don rtogs pas// rang byung chos sku kha mig can/ ye shes sgo lnga gsal bar 'dus// theg gzhan sangs rgyas 'dod pa de// blos byas rnam gsum nges don med// de phyir yang ti sangs rgyas kyi// 'bras bu bar dor sangs rgyas sku// kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ nges don gyi sangs rgyas bstan pa'i le'u ste so drug pa'o//// de nas ston pa kun bzang gis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la don gtad pa// nges don 'dus pa'i yang snying 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'i chos// rig 'dzin rnams kyis thugs la sbas// chos skyong kun gyis gter ltar bsrung// mkha' 'gro rnams kyis mig ltar 'tsho// de phyir rgyud 'di shin tu gnyan// de don man ngag nges don 'di// log sred chags zhen ma nges la// nam yang bstan par ma gsungs so// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// yang dag nges don khyad par can// 'bras bu mngon 'byung nges pa 'di// snod ngan rnams la ma gsang na// tshe thung sdug bsngal nad 'byung zhing// phyi ma thar med dmyal bar ltung// de phyir mi bstan snod ngan ni// bla mar mi gus nga rgyal can// tshul 'chos byed cing slob dpon smod// dbul ba med par gdams ngag 'dod// bka' rkun byas nas yod tshul ston// don ma go bas chos la sdang// dpe rkun byas pas phyi thag thung// 'gran sems bcug pas mched dang mkhon// gnas lugs ma shes rang mthong che// nga rang mkhas zhes bla ma smod// sngon nas yod zer rdzun du smra// gzhan nas rnyed zer thabs kyis tshol// phyi nas dbul zhes slob dpon brid// chos rjes bya zhes thabs kyis bslu// g.yo sgyu skyon kyis chos 'tshol la// nam yang bstan par mi bya'o// de yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// gal te 'khor gyis chos bstan na// phyi nang chos skyong kun khros nas// ma nyes kha yogs sna tshogs 'ong// byas pa med par mi rnams sdang// ser snas bsags pa'i rdzas rnams brlag/ rang nyid smyo 'bog sgur por 'gro// rgyal 'gong chags nas gnas mi rnyed// phyi mar dmyal ba chen por ltung// de phyir shin tu gsang bar bya// de tshe nges don yang snying 'di// gu lang gser bzhin mi nub tsam// snod ldan 'ga' la bstan pa las// snang dgu kun gyi spyod yul min// 'khor rnams nges pa de ltar zhog/ kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste so bdun pa'o//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang/ bod kyi lots+tsa ba A tsar+ya dran pa ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa rdzogs so// rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa'i yang snying kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud rin po che gser gyi yang zhun zhes bya ba/ shang pa che chung ba ye shes
181
1 rgyal mtshan gyi thugs dam/ bla ma gnyan chung ba la gnang ba/ gnyan chung bas 'brom zhang 'bar la gnang ba/ rje btsun zhang 'bar gyis/ skye sgom la gnang ba/ skye sgom gyis/ sgyer ban 'od de la gnang ba'o
####
1
2 rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa bzhugs/ rgya gar skad du/ ma hA san+ti ni yA mAr+tha sarba sa mu dA ya/ dz+nyA na ga ga na sa mA na tan+ta/ dr-iSh+ti b+hA ba na sarba gar+b+ha/ rat+na byU ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud/ lta bsgom thams cad kyi snying po/ rin po che rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyal po rang byung rig pa'i ye shes/ rtogs pa'i don dang ldan pa/ dpal gyi dpal gyur kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad gsungs pa'i dus gcig na/ kun rigs sems kyi rgyal po de// 'og min chos kyi dbyings gnas na// nges pa'i don la rab bzhugs te// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i// 'khor rnams 'dus nas rab tu 'khod// de tshe rdo rje
2
2 sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i tshogs la phan don du// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po la// rang gi rig pas 'di skad gsol// nges don gnas lugs snying po yi// de 'khor sprul pa gang gis bskul// sangs rgyas bka' rnams ji ltar bgros// ma rig mun pa gang gis sel// de don chos rnams ji ltar gsungs// de skad ces ni zhus ma thag/ khab len la ni lcags 'du bzhin// dad pas rang dbang med par ni// 'khor rnams 'dud cing bskor zhing bskor// de tshe 'dus pa rnam bzhi yang// rdo rje gsang ba rin chen snying// dri med grags pa las rab grub// rgyal ba'i dbang po bsod nams snying// zhi ba bde dang nyi ma'i 'od// nam mkha'i snying po 'bum gzigs dang// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang bzhugs// rig 'dzin sems dpa' chen po yang// blo gros gtso dang rnam dag snying// dam pa'i yon tan 'od rlabs can// shes rab bla ma rgyal mtshan 'dzin// rnam par grol ba ting 'dzin dbang// chos dbang dang ni spobs pa brtsegs// bdud 'joms dang ni seng ge'i sgra// rin chen mthong dang brtse ba can// dbang phyug gtso dang brtsegs dge dang/ mthong na dga' dang bde mos dang// gsung brtsegs la sogs 'khor rnams kun// rang rang gtso la bskor nas ni// mi brjed pa yi gzungs kyis 'khod// rgyal sras sprul pa'i 'khor rnams dang// tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal chen bzhi// thags bzang ris dang gang ba bzang// chos kyi rgyal po rta mgo can// zur phud lnga pa nor srung dang// mgrin bcu dang ni klu rgyal dang// de 'khor la sogs kun kyang gnas// mkha' 'gro sde lnga srin mo'i tshogs// ye shes mkha' 'gro rig pa 'dzin// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rigs kyi yum// rin chen mkha' 'gro 'dod dgu bsgyur// pad+ma mkha' 'gro bde chen rgyas// las kyi mkha' 'gro lus sgrib sbyangs// 'jig rten mkha' 'gro dam btags pa'i// 'khor gyi gtor zan pho mo kun// snying rje med par gsod la dga'// skyon mthong tsa na chad pa gcod// kun kyang srin po'i cha byad can// rngams pa'i nga ro 'jigs pa'i tshul// bstan pa bsrung phyir dus der
3
2 'dus// sprul sku snang ba'i 'khor rnams ni// dad ldan lha mi las can kun// mos shing dad pas 'dus pa yi// las dang thugs rje 'dzoms nas 'khod// de tshe zhus pa'i don gsan nas// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po yis// mnyam pa'i don la thugs zhugs nas// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa// legs so dad ldan 'khor rnams kun// de don gsal bar ngas bshad kyi// yid ni gzhan du ma g.yengs par// nges par nyon la yid kyis zung// de skad ces ni gsungs ma thag/ 'khor rnams dga' mgu yi rang te// dad pas rtse gcig yid bsdus nas// gus pa'i rig pas chos nyan to// de tshe 'khor gyi don ched du// mnyam pa'i don las rab bzhengs te// ye shes chos sku'i dgongs pa yis// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// nges don gnas lugs snying po de// 'khor 'das 'byung bas ma rig phyir// ma skyes ma bcos rgyus ma mdzad// de nyid ma yengs rig par shes// de la 'gro dang 'ong ba med// de phyir rang byung ngo bo'i sku// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de 'khor sprul pa bskul ba ni// sems dag lha dbang rig 'dzin des// rmi lam rnam gsum brda shes pas// mngon dga' phug nas 'di skad bskul// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus kun// gsung gi mnga' bdag khyed yin pas// rtsol bcas theg pa mthar bton nas// rtsol med theg pa mi gsung nas// thugs rje chen po yal lam ci// skal ldan 'dul bya ma mchis sam// lhun grub theg pa bshad du gsol// de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun bsdus te// don gyi 'gro ba mdzad pa'i phyir// bka' yi mdo 'di ma bkrol na// kun bzang thugs kyi nges pa'i don// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod yin pas// tshig gcig don kun rtogs pa'i chos// btsal med don dang 'phrad par zhus// de skad bskul ba'i don de ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yis rig nas// ngo bo nyid kyi kun bzang la// nges pa'i yid kyis 'di skad zhus// chos nyid gnas lugs ji lta ba// sems nyid blo yis rtogs pa'i don// nges don kun tu bzang po yis// dus 'dir bdag la bshad du gsol// de skad ces ni bskul ba dang// kun bzang thugs kyis gsan nas ni// ting 'dzin rig pa'i gsung gis ni// dad ldan 'khor la bka' stsal pa// yang dag nges don rgyud chen 'di// snod ldan rnams la ngas bshad de// rdzogs chen skye med don zab kyang// ma rtogs pa la sdig mor che// de skad ces ni gsungs ma thag/ 'khor rnams dad pas 'dus pa rnams// snod dang ldan par dam bcas nas// sems kyi 'dung ba 'di skad bton// 'khor ba'i g.yang sar ltung ba la// thugs rje chen pos mi 'dzin nas//
4
2 re dogs 'dzin pa'i rgyar chud na// rnam rtog dra ba mi gcod dam// sems can las la thugs chad na// 'gro don snying rje mi mdzad dam// ma rig mun pa'i smag rum du// dmus long bzhin du rang sems 'thib// ye shes nyi ma mi 'char ram// zhe sdang me chen 'bar ba la// las kyis rlung dmar chen pos bus// chos nyid rlan gyis mi 'jil lam// 'dod chags chu ltar 'brub nas kyang// bse rtsi lta bur zhen pa la// ye shes me yis mi bsreg gam// don stor lus kyi nang du stor// lam stor bdag la sa mkhan mdzod// de skad gdung bas bskul ba dang// kun bzang ston pa'i thugs rje yis// snod dang ldan par thugs gzigs nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' yis gnang// 'dus pa'i don du bka' bgros te// dang po rtogs thabs chos drug gi// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po byung// de phyir rang byung snying po la// nga yis nga nyid 'grol ba las// gzhan gyis bka' 'di 'grol du med// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod nyon cig/ nges don tshig gi don 'grol na// kun bzang nga yi byin rlabs kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs las// sprul pa rnam gsum byung nas ni// nges dang ldem dgongs drang don du// 'khor gyi blo yi khyad par las// ci rigs pa ni bshad par bgro// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ma rig mun pa sel ba ni// gzhan gyis sel bar nus min phyir// nges don bka' yi sgron ma 'di// ma rig mun sel nyi zla che// ma rig mun pa rtsad nas 'joms// 'khor 'das 'byung ba'i rtsa ba ni// ye shes ma rig yin pa'i phyir// thog ma'i byung tshul sus shes pa// ma rig mun pa sel ba'i mchog/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma rig mun sel nyi zla che// 'char nub yod phyir nyi zla che// de bzhin theg brgyad chos kun spang// gzhi nyid ma shes 'joms mi nus// yang ti theg chen snying po 'di// nges shes don ldan lung rtogs na// ma rig mun pa sel zhes bya// rin chen 'od la 'char nub med// gzhi yi ye shes ngos zin na// chos sku'i don dang bral ba med// de phyir ma rig mun pa brlag/ ma rig rnam gsum 'joms pa'i phyir// lung ldan ston pa'i bka' 'di bgros// de phyir nges don rgyud 'di la// shes rab rnam gsum mtha' ru gtug/ da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// don dang mthun pa'i gzhi shes phyir// ma rig sangs pas ye shes rgyas// de phyir rtogs dang sangs rgyas pa// lus dang ma bral dus 'dir byung// ma rig mun sel ye shes sku// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste// sangs rgyas dgongs pa da lta nyid// phyi ma ma yin dus 'dir yin// de phyir mun sel rig pa 'di// chos rnams kun gyi snying po la// rang byung ye shes sus shes pa// ma rig med pas
5
2 chos skur shar// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de don chos rnams gsungs pa ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang// rtsa ba chos sku rtogs pa'i phyir// gzi ldan nor bu rin chen bzhin// chos rje ston pa kun bzang gis// thams cad ye shes chen por mkhyen// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de don rang rig chos kyi sku// tshig dang rang gis brjod las 'das// rang byung ye shes thugs la gsal// drang srong mngon shes dpe bzhin du// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'khor bcas kyi// mnyam bzhag pas ni yid kyi go// nges don rtogs phyir yang sangs rgyas// rang rig chos sku'i byin rlabs bshad// de nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// rgyud dag mngon du gyur pa yis// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' des// byin gyis brlabs pa'i don rig nas// gtsang ma ris kyi lha gnas kyang// yangs dog med pa'i gzhal yas khang// phyi nang med par 'od gsal ba'i// grangs kyi 'og min gnas de ru// longs sku thugs kyis 'dul ba'i dus// rig 'dzin 'khor la brtser dgongs te// snga phyi min pa'i rig pa 'di// da lta'i dus 'di yin par gsungs// rig 'dzin kun dga' lha dbang la// thun mong ma yin dbang bskur nas// dbu rgyan bka' rtags rgyag shing byin// gsang mtshan btags nas rgyud smin byas// gsang sngags yang ti nges don chos// 'khor 'das ma reg chos kyi sku// rang rig ye shes rig pa de// ldem dgongs rang rig ngo bos bshad// de nas rig 'dzin sems dag gis// phyogs bcu 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas la// zhu ba the tshom bcad pa'i phyir// lus ngag gus pa'i dad pa yis// shar phyogs mngon dga'i zhing khams na// sangs rgyas rdo rje gsang ba ni// rdo rje rab 'bar gdan la bzhugs// 'khor la btsal med chos rnams ston// de la bskor ba byas nas ni// kun nas dang pa'i dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang// bdud rtsi za ma tog gang phul// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// yang dag dgongs pa'i chos nyid kyi// sems nyid mi 'gyur rdo rje la// skye 'chi 'byung ba ji ltar lags// nges don zhus pa'i don gsan nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje gsang ba des// lha yi bdud rtsis thugs mnyes te// zhus pa'i lan du bka' stsal pa// gzhi nyid mi 'gyur rdo rje la// skye mchi yod pa ma yin te// rang gi rnam rtog gzung 'dzin gyis// tha mal lus la skye 'chi byung// de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// rang gis sems kyi the tshom chod// zhu ba zhus nas nges pa rnyed// de phyir rtogs pa mngon du gyur// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// lho phyogs 'dul bral med pa yi// rin chen brtsegs pa'i zhing khams na// rin chen snying po rin chen ldan// 'khor la rgya cher btsal
6
2 med ston/ de la bskor ba byas nas kyang// kun nas 'dod pa'i dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang// ma gi za ma tog gang phul nas ni// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// sangs rgyas nges pa'i chos sku la// de don rtsol bas ma bsgrubs par// yon tan 'bras bu ji ltar 'char// de don zhus pa'i don gsan nas// sangs rgyas rin chen snying po de// ma gi ta yis thugs mnyes nas// zhus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// tak+Sha ka yis rgyan bzhin du// ye nas gnas pa'i chos nyid la// rgyu 'bras mthar phyin gzhi nas rdzogs// nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'bras bu 'byung// de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang// rang bzhin gzhi yi the tshom chod// zhu ba zhus phyir nges pa rnyed// de phyir lhag mthong mngon du gyur// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nub phyogs sgrib pa med pa yi// pad+ma can gyi zhing khams na// sangs rgyas dri med grags pa de/ pad+ma'i gdan la 'bras bu ston// de la bskor ba byas nas kyang// kun nas yid ches dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang// pany+tsA li ka'i na bza' phul// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// sems nyid pad ltar dag pa la// gzung 'dzin dri mas ji ltar gos// de skad zhus pas don gsan nas// sangs rgyas dri med grags pa de// pany+tsA li kas thugs mnyes nas// zhus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// pad+ma 'dam gyis ma gos ltar// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la// gzung 'dzin dri ma gzhi la med// 'khrul pa'i blo la dri ma byung// de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// rang gi blo yi the tshom chod// zhu ba zhus phyir nges pa rnyed// nges pa'i ye shes mngon du gyur// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// byang phyogs rnam dag zhing khams na// sangs rgyas las rab grub pa de// in+d+ra nI la'i gdan bzhugs te// nges don btsal med 'bras bu ston// de la bskor ba byas nas ni// kun nas nyams myong dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang// ta pa la yi 'bras bu phul// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// chos sku gcig las med pa'i phyir// btsal med sems kyi rang bzhin la// 'gro don mdzad pa ci ltar lags// de skad zhus pas don gsan nas// sangs rgyas las rab grub pa de// me tog ta bas thugs dgyes te// zhus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// rang byung chos sku rtogs gyur na// bya ba'i las rnams mi dgos te// nor bu rin chen rnyed pa 'dra// mdzad pa 'phrin las rang las 'byung// de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// rang gi 'khrul pa'i the tshom chod// zhu ba zhus phyir nges pa rnyed// de phyir 'bras bu mngon du gyur// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// shar lho 'tshe med zhing khams na// sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po des// dad ldan nyid kyi 'khor rnams la// btsal med 'bras bu'i
7
2 chos rnams ston// de la bskor ba byas nas ni// kun nas rang rig dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang// dpag bsam shing gi 'bras bu phul// de don yang dag don zhus pa// ye nas rang byung snying po de// chos nyid ye nas rang chas la// thos bsam dgos pa ji ltar lags// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de// dpag bsam 'bras bus thugs mnyes te// zhus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// ye nas chos nyid rang chas la// thos bsam dgos pa ma yin te// ma rig mun pa bsal ba'i phyir// lung ldan rkyen gyis yid ches bskyed// de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang// thos bsam dgos par the tshom chod// zhu ba zhus phyir nges pa rnyed// de phyir ye shes mngon du gyur// da yang 'dus ba'i snying po nyon// lho nub rnam dag zhing khams na// sangs rgyas bsod nams snying po des/ dad ldan rang gi 'khor rnams la// btsal med 'bras bu'i chos rnams ston// de la bskor ba byas nas ni// kun nas shes rab dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du ni// shing tog ba men rwa gang phul// de la dgos pa'i don zhus pa// ye nas rgyun kyi ting 'dzin gyis// chos nyid ye nas 'od gsal la// bying rgod 'byung ba ji ltar lags// de skad zhus pas don gsan nas// sangs rgyas bsod nams snying po de// shing tog la ni thugs mnyes de// zhus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// chos nyid ye nas 'od gsal la// rnam smin lus dang ma bral phyir// log non gdams ngag med pa la// tshogs brgyad rkyen gyis bying rgod 'byung// de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// rang gis bsgom pas the tshom chod// zhu ba zhu phyir nges pa rnyed// de phyir ting 'dzin mngon du gyur// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nub byang 'khor med zhing khams na// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i dbang po de// dad ldan nyid kyi 'khor rnams la// btsal med 'bras bu rgya cher ston// de la bskor ba byas nas ni// yid ches pa yis dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang// sbrang rtsi phru ba gang phul nas// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// rang rig kun gzhi gzhi cha ni// ye nas rang byung rgyu med la// 'phel 'grib 'byung ba ji ltar lags// de skad zhus pas don gsan nas// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i dbang po de// sbrang rtsi phul bas thugs mnyes nas// zhus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// rang byung ye shes snying po la// 'phel 'grib yod pa ma yin te// ma rig mun pa ma sel phyir// kun gzhi'i rkyen gyis 'phel 'grib byung// de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// 'phel 'grib med par the tshom chod// zhu ba zhus nas nges pa rnyed// de phyir ye shes mngon du gyur// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// byang shar las dag
8
2 zhing khams na// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i snying po de// dad ldan rang gi 'khor rnams la// sems kyi 'bras bu'i chos rnams ston// de la bskor ba byas nas kyang// kun nas dad pa'i gdengs kyis ni// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang// rin chen ke ta'i 'bras bu phul// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// rang gi sems nyid gnyug ma la// gzhi la thog mtha' med pa la// 'khor 'das thog mtha' 'ong ba ci// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od zer de// rin chen ke tas thugs mnyes te// zhus pa'i lan ni bka' bstsal pa// gzhi nyid dus gsum 'gyur med la// blo yis bcos su mi 'dod phyir// ye shes ma rig khyad par las// 'khor 'das gnyis la thog mtha' byung// de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// thog mtha' yod med the tshom chod// zhu ba zhus phyir nges pa rnyed// de phyir 'bras bu mngon du gyur// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// mtha' dbus med pa'i zhing khams na// sangs rgyas nam mkha'i snying po de// dad nyan rnams kyi 'khor rnams la// btsal med 'bras bu'i chos rnams ston// de la bskor ba byas nas ni// kun nas mthar thug dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang// ut+pal yi me tog phul// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo la// gzhi la snang ba med pa la// glo bur 'khrul snang ji ltar byung// de skad ces ni zhus ma thag/ sangs rgyas nam mkha'i snying po de// ut+pa la yis thugs dgyes te// zhus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// gzhi la snang med nam mkha' 'dra// ma rig rkyen byas gzung 'dzin gyis// rang gi gzhan snang 'khrul pa'i phyir// bag chags snang ba sprin ltar byung// de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// snang ba yod med the tshom chod// zhu ba zhus phyir nges pa rnyed// de phyir 'bras bu mngon du gyur// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yon tan rgyas pa'i zhing khams na// sangs rgyas 'bum gzigs bya ba de// nyid kyis dad nyan 'khor rnams la// btsal med 'bras bu'i chos rnams ston// de la bskor ba byas nas ni// kun nas yid ches dad pa yis// nges don zhu ba'i rten du yang// pad+ma gser gyi mdog can phul// de la nges pa'i don zhus pa// 'bral med rgyun gyi ting 'dzin gyis// rig pa phyi nang med pa la// mnyam bzhag rjes thob 'ong ba ci// de skad zhus pa'i don gsan nas// sangs rgyas 'bum gzigs bzhugs pa de// gser gyi pad+mos thugs dgyes nas// zhus pa'i lan de bka' stsal pa// ye shes rig pa 'di nyid la// mnyam bzhag rjes thob gdod nas med// nges don 'di med sgom chen la// sgo lnga'i yul la rjes thob byung// de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// mnyam bzhag rjes thob the tshom chod//
9
2 zhu ba zhus phyir nges pa rnyed// de phyir ye shes mngon du gyur// de nas rig 'dzin sems dag de// sngon gyi gnas ni rjes dran nas// sum cu rtsa gsum shar phyogs kyi// rin chen mngon dga' phug tu phyin// nang du 'bral med mnyam bzhag pas// sems can kun gyi don ched du// lha dbang brgya byin drung byon nas// lha yi bu la 'di skad bskul// khyod ni shAka thub sprul pa ste// 'jig rten gsum na 'gran zla med// sangs rgyas chos kun thugs la rdzogs// 'dod khams 'dzam gling snod ldan la// bstan pa tsam gyis rtogs pa'i chos// sdeb sbyor legs pa'i tshig tu gsungs// de skad ces ni bskul ba dang// lha dbang la ni lan gsol pa// nges don gsang ba'i rgyud chen 'di// rang gi sems la gsal ba las// tshig gi thog tu mi phebs pas// bdag gis bgro ba shin tu dka'// de skad ces ni smras pa dang// de yis dgongs pa'i don go nas// lha dbang gis ni don zhus pa// phyi rabs dad ldan don ched du// yang dag nges don dgongs pa de// ma rtogs pa la tshig sgo nas// mtshon nas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// ci rigs pa ni khyod kyis bgros// de skad ces ni zhus pa dang// rig 'dzin kun gyi don ched du// rig 'dzin kun dgas thugs gsan nas// sku drin che bar lan btab pa// lha dbang bka' gnyan drin che bas// mi yul 'dzam gling dad ldan gyi// ma rig mun pa bdag gis bsal// bde gshegs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs// de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang// rig 'dzin chen po lha dbang de// shin tu thugs ni dgyes gyur te// lha dbang gis ni zhal bzhes pa// nges pa'i don ldan slob ma la// nges don gsang ba'i rgyud chen 'di// ma bcos ma bslad 'chad nus na// bde gshegs 'khor gyis byin gyis brlabs// de skad zhal bzhes dam bcas nas// de yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de nas lha yi bu yis bsams pa la// mi la mngon shes rdzu 'phrul med// de phyir nges pa'i snod ldan la// 'dzam gling mi la bshad dgongs nas// sprul pa skye ba'i rten btsal ba// rigs bzang rigs ngan bud med de// gnod sbyin kun gsos byang chub ma// de yi bur skyes thugs dgongs nas// bya ni ngang pa gser lus can// dngul gyi gshog pa lcags sder can// g.yu yi smin ma rdo rje'i mchu// rin chen mig can gcig tu sprul// nam langs nyi ma shar mtshams su// nyi zer la ni bya byung nas// byang chub snying gar mchu gtugs nas// snying gar thim nas zhag gsum nas// khye'u chung rgyag shing rdo rje can// tsar gyis skyes nas 'di skad smras// chos kun byang chub ye shes yin// 'khor ba ma rig ye nas min// rgyu rkyen ma bskyed ngo bo nyid// rang gi rig pa chos sku yin// de ltar
10
2 sgrogs pa zhig byung bas// 'jig rten 'di na ya mtshan can// mtshan yang dga' rab rdo rjer btags// yon tan rig pa lnga ldan la// mngon shes drug gis dus gcig mkhyen// mi rnams kun gyis bkur bar mthong// yon tan lags kyis spyan drangs nas// bde ldan gnas su bzhugs su gsol// de tshe sprul pa dga' rab de// nang du ting 'dzin dgongs pa la// 'bral med rgyun du thugs zhugs pas// gnod sbyin bdud kyis mtho btsams te// bar chod bya phyir phung phyed bzhis// bsdigs dang brid pa'i las rnams byas// lha yi bdud du shes pa yis// mya zhing smyo la dran pa rlag/ snying rje'i don du ting 'dzin glod// brid bsdigs gnyis kyis ma bslus nas// bdud ni yid mug zil gnon nas// gdung ba bton cing skyabs zhus pa// snying rje chen pos bdag la gzigs// ma rig las kyi srin por skyes// sems can lus srog zas su zos// las ngan 'gyod pa'i yid kyis bshags// nyid kyi bstan pa bdag gis bsrung// dam nyams lus srog zas su len// bdag gi srog gi snying po 'di// 'bul gyis thugs rjes ma chung zhig/ de skad ces ni skyabs gsol nas// rig 'dzin chen po dga' rab la// rang srog snying po phul nas ni// bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes nas// dam la btags te bran du byas// gsang ba'i man ngag rnam bzhi mdzad// da nas shAka thub sprul pa des// bkra shis bde ldan gnas dag tu// de lta dus kyi deng sang na// gsang bdag sprul pa dang nyan la// sdeb sbyor legs pa'i tshig tu gsung// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// shes rab blo yi khyad par las// sku gsum chos rnams gcig gsungs pa'i// bshad lugs rnam pa de dag kun// 'dul bya'i 'khor la tha dad kyang// dus gsum gcig phyir khyad med pas// don la dbyer med ngo bo gcig/ rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa'i snying po/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ nges don 'byung ba'i rgyu gleng gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i tshogs la phan gdags phyir// gus pa'i sems kyis rab sbyar te// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di skad gsol// chos nyid gnas lugs nges pa 'di// snod kyi rim pa gang la bstan// chos rnams gtan la ci ltar dbab// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pas don gsan nas// kun rig ston pas 'khor rnams la// chos nyid gnas lugs bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// gzhi la gang yang med pa'i phyir// rang rig rtogs pa'i chos sku+u la// 'khor 'das bzhi la med shes phyir// chos nyid nges pa'i gnas lugs yin// da yang
11
2 'dus ba'i snying po nyon// don bstan snod bcud rim pa ni// yang dag sangs rgyas nges pa'i don// gsang sngags kun gyi rtsa ba yin// dbang rnams rim par rdzogs byas nas// chos kyi gzhung dang mi 'gal ba// thos bsam bsgom la rag ma lus// nges don bka' rgyud gsang ba yi// dam pa mdzod kyi gnyer ldan zhing// srid par zhus kyang zad med pa'i// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon de// tshul 'chos med par gdeng dang ldan// dper na gangs kyi seng ge bzhin// gcig pur gnas kyang don ldan pa// sangs rgyas dgongs pa thugs la 'chang// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// skal ldan slob ma'i mtshan nyid ni// bla ma la gus dad pa ldan// ser sna chung la brtson 'grus che// brtse dang dam tshig mi 'gal bsrung// don gsal thub pa'i shes rab zab// tshul shes ngang bzang rnams kyi don// yon tan zag med rnams kyi gter// thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi ru bstan// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// dang po dad pa sngon song ba'i// lus srog mi blta gtong phod can// 'khor 'das gcig tu bstan pa la// skrag cing 'jigs pa med pa yi// the tshom med par dus tshod zin// rtogs par bya ba'i thabs su bstan// dpa' gtum seng ge'i brtson 'grus kyis// sngags dang mtshan nyid ma 'dres pa'i// khyad par 'phags pa'i gdams ngag gi/ nges pa don gyi gdams ngag zhu// glang chen mi ldog dgra 'joms ltar// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis// spyod pa mi brtags chos la brtags// mtshams med lnga yang chos skur shes// sa ku rtsi yi rkang lag bzhin// nges don rang rig chos sku la// rgyun du mi 'bral gdams ngag ni// mi brjed gzungs kyis zin par bya// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// nges don gsang thub zhe la 'chang// spyod pa 'jam pa'i tshul dang ldan// khram med spro ring ngang bzang la// nges don bstan pa'i snod du rung// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dang mi ldan 'di bstan na// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' bcag ste// mtshams med sdig pa'i char mi phod// dmyal ba'i 'og gzhi byed par gsungs// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ snod bcud bstan pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po yis/ chos rnams gtan la dbab pa'i phyir// don gyi dbye ba 'di gsungs pa// yang dag nges don rtogs pa'i thabs// kun gzhi rnam gsum las 'khrul phyir// theg gzhan lnga yi khyad par dbye// sems kyi skyon drug ngos bzung la// sun gdon bdun gyis shan dbye ba'o// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// khyad 'phags dbang lngas rang rgyud smin// yon tan
12
2 bzhi yi don shes phyir// dam tshig lnga yi gzhi bzung la// skabs dbye lnga yi go phye nas// dpe don khyad par rnam pa bzhis// 'dus pa lnga yis don brtson phyir// bar do lnga yis gtan la dbab// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rtsa ba bzhi yis mdor bsdus te// bsgom yod bzhi yis nyams su blangs// ched spyod gsum ni don du spyod// chos 'phrul bzhi byung zil gyis mnan// snying po lnga yis ngos bzung la// gol sa lnga yis skyon bstan te// nyams pa drug ni ltung ba'i phyir// ye shes bzhi yis shan phye nas// bka' rtags bzhi yis nges mtshon nas// gdams ngag drug gis thag bcad de// nges don gsum gyi don go nas// the tshom gsang bzhi nges bsal nas// rang shar drug gis bsgoms mi dgos// thig le brgyad kyis khyad par bstan// sa lam rim pa dus gcig rdzogs// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nges don bdun gyis nyams su blangs// nyams myong bzhi yis gting du go// rig dpyod bzhi yis la bzla la// klong chen drug gis nges pa rnyed// rkyen thob drug gis 'bral med shes// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sku gsum thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshad// yon tan lnga yis 'bras bu 'byung// nges pa bzhi yis khyad par 'phags// zil gnon rtags bzhi 'bras bur ldan// che ba lnga yis dngos 'dzin dag/ rang gnas drug gis gzhan don bya// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// gnyis med gsum gyis la bzla la// gtan tshigs bzhi yis yid ches bya// 'bras bu rgyu yis mtha' ru gtug/ rtogs pa bzhi yi gdeng ldan bya// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ chos rnams gtan la dbab pa sdom du bsdus te bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po la// nges pa'i dgos don 'di skad gsol// sems kyi kun gzhi ji ltar byung// bag chags kun gzhi ji ltar bgos// lus kyi kun gzhi ji ltar smin// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// 'di skad zhus pas don gsan nas// kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// kun gzhi rnam gsum dbye ba'i don// sems kyi kun gzhi bka' stsal pa// thog ma tha ma da lta dang// ngo bo nges tshig che chung shes// mtshan nyid mnyen po las dang rtsal// yul dpe rtags kyi sgo nas bstan// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sems kyi kun gzhi thog mar kyang// gang la mi rtog sa ma zin// ma shes lhan cig ma rig pa// rtog zhugs sems kyi kun gzhi byung// da lta gang na gnas pa'i rten// 'gro drug sems can ma lus kyang// nyan thos rang rgyal sems dpa' la// thun mong dang ni ma yin tshul// da yang
13
2 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// tha mar gar 'gro nges pa ni// gnyen po lung ldan rang shar nas// rim gyis gcig char nges par nges// don ma phrad na nges pa med// ngo bo gzhi nyid ma shes phyir// bag chags gnyid log kun gzhi ste// ma rig rtog pa'i ngo bor gnas// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// nges tshig yul gyi snang ba la// sna tshogs yul la sems pa'i phyir// min pa'i chos la bden par 'dzin// thag pa sprul du 'khrul dang 'dra// sems can shas ni che chung yod// nyon mongs sems dpa' mnyen pos ni// bag nyal phra dang shin tu phra// mngon rgyu med pas nyon mongs chung// rgyu med mtshan med 'jig pa'i phyir// tha ma dngos po med par dengs// da lta kun gzhi yod kyi bar// rgyun gyis dus gsum 'gags te med// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// thun mong snying po dbyings sogs kyi// nyon mongs bag chags rang bzhin te// shes rab ma rig log lta 'joms// thun mong ma yin cig char dengs// las kyi rgyud mthun gang rung ste// rnam smin rim gyis ma yin te// bar ma chod par 'bras bu smin// lung du ma bstan nges pa med// da yang rdo rje snying po nyon// bag chags rtsal ni rigs drug ste// bde sdug bye brag so sor snang// cha phra rtsal ni nyan sems la// me long lta bur rang snang nas// mtshon pa dpe yis ris dang ldan// nam mkha' chu dang me long sogs// gzhi la rgyu rkyen ma rig pa// med par byung pa ya mtshan che// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag dbye ba blo dman la// yid ches bya phyir bstan pa yin// ma rig pa la sems su btags// 'khor ba bskyed phyir kun gzhi yin// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ gzhi gnas sems kyi kun gzhi bstan pa'i le'u bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pa chos rje yis// bag chags kun gzhi bka' stsal pa// dang po da lta tha ma dang// ngo bo mtshan nyid nges tshig dang// dpe brtags gnyen po dbye ba rtsal// rnam grangs de dag bsdus te gsungs// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// thog mar mtha' drug rtog las byung// gang la mi rtog don ma zin// yengs pa'i tshul las rtog pa byung// rang snang sgrib pa bag chags brtas// bag chags snga phyi'i rgyu la brten// 'gag pa ma rig sdug bsngal 'byung// chos sku mi 'gyur 'khor bar brten// de phyir lus sems bag chags yod// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// gang 'gro dus la nges med rkyen// ye shes 'phrad na bag chags brlag/ de med dag pas thabs med do// nyi med mun par mi 'gro 'dra// ngo bo brdzun la bden 'dzin pa// rtog pa zhen rgyud brtas pa na// da lta bag chags
14
2 rgyun mi chad// de phyir 'khor bar yang yang bskyed// mtshan nyid gcig gis bskyed gyur pas// 'bras bu rigs dang so sor smin// rgyu rkyen tshogs dang mnyen pos 'joms// che chung ji 'dra brten par snang// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bag chags kun gzhi rtog pa ste// nges tshig rtog rgyu cha phra de// bag tsam brten rtog brtas pa las// bag chags kun gzhi yul du byas// 'bras bu las kyis smin par byed// thog mar bcas dang thog ma med// gar smin zil gnon bag chags chung// lung du ma bstan smin mi nus// nam mkha' sprin dang sa gzhi bzhin// g.ya' rdul lbu ba bag chags dpe// 'dra yang don min mtshon par zad// glo bur yul byung gzhi la med// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// bag chags kun 'dus phung po la// rgyu mthun rnam par smin pa ste// phung lnga dus gsum mi bral 'byung// 'khrul brtas brtag tu brtan pa yin// gnyis po thun mong thun min gnyis// thun mong dad pa brtson 'grus dang// mos dran ting 'dzin sogs rnams so// thun mong ma yin ye shes dag/ bag nyal sngon du rgyu gcig gis// bskyed dang bsgrub dang gzhan du 'gyur// gzhan ltos ngo bo grub par 'dod// dbye ba ma nor brtags pa yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rtsal dang shas ni che chung ste// sdug bsngal skye rgas na 'chi ste// byams bral dgra 'phrad med tshol rnyed// 'khor ba'i bag chags rtsal du byung// grangs la mang du yod mod kyang// bag nyon rtog pa skyon dang g.yog/ sgrib ltung gol sa 'khrul pa ste// yul yod bar du grangs thug med// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de dag 'khrul pa yul las byung// yul sems bar dor gol sa chod// bag chags gzhi la gos pa med// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad la 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ phral byung gi bag chags kyi kun gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas kun rig ston pa des// skal ldan dad ldan 'khor rnams la// lus kyi kun gzhi bka' stsal pa// dbye ba ngo bo mtshan nyid dang// las dang dpe ldan rtogs par gsungs// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang bzhin bag chags yid kyi lus// thog ma tha ma da lta'i khyad// nges par gtan la dbab pa'i phyir// tha dad lus kyi gzhi las byung// ngo bo rtsal shugs tha dad pa'i// snang dang thig le'i rtsal med kyang// gong gi lus nyid de la brten// lus dang bag chags dbang gis snang// de yis mtshan nyid chos sku dang// bag lus rang bzhin lus la brten// gcig dang tha dad gnyis ka min// 'khor 'das brten yang de ltar gnas// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// nyan thos sems dpa'
15
2 sangs rgyasala'ang// rdzu 'phrul mtshan nyid dpe byad kun gyi gzhi// sems can sgo gsum de la brten// lus kyi kun gzhi rten pa'i las// de yis mtshon pa'i dpe gsungs pa// lus kyi kun gzhi khyim dang 'dra// nyi ma 'jug pa'i bde brdal 'dra// gza' skar 'char ba'i nam mkha' 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag kun gzhi rnam gsum yang// kun brtags bag chags kun gzhi byung// zung du 'dzom pas kun gzhi grub// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ nyon mongs lus kyi kun gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa gnyis pa'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi don ched du// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po la// bden pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// rtsa ba gcig pa'i chos nyid la// 'khor ba'i gzhi ni gang gis byas// 'gro drug sdug bsngal ci las byung// mu stegs rtag chad ji ltar 'khrul// theg pa'i rim pa gang las byung// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pas don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'khor gzhi shes pa lung ma bstan// rang bzhin lus kyi rtsal snang ba// gang la mi rtog don ma zin// shes pa rang snang don ma bcos// ma rig rgyu yis nges med phyir/ shes bzhin lung ma bstan zhes bya// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang bzhin ngo bo'i lus de ni// yengs dang ma yengs cha med pas// had de bun ne tsam du gnas// rang byung rnam shes rkyen dbang 'gyur// de phyir lung ma bstan zhes bya// gzhi ni dran dang ma dran gyi// blo ni 'jug cing don mi shes// ma rig gzhi ni lung ma bstan// de phyir 'khor ba'i gzhi zhes bya// yid byung rim 'grib log pa'i rgyus// gya gyu tsam du dran yod kyang// don du ma shes de kho na// ma rig bskor ba'i gzhi med phyir// dang po 'khor ba de las byung// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor ba'i gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// 'gro drug sdug bsngal byung ba ni// dang po 'khor 'das bar do la// med la yod dran yid tsam byung// lung ma bstan phyir rim gyis 'grib// shes pa mun po thib kyis 'thib// dpyad kyang ngo mi shes pa dang// gang yang mi shes gti mug la// bag nyal zhen pa phra mo byung// de ma thag tu 'dzin pa yis// ma rig lhan cig rnam gsum la// kun brtags gsum gyis rkyen byas pas// thag pa sbrul du 'dzin pa bzhin// dpa' bo yul yan gzung 'dzin gyis// 'jig rten lha mi
16
2 shes pa rtsings// thar lam mi thob skye 'chir brtags// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ma rig gzhon pa nges pa ni// le lo snyoms las dman la sbyar// chags sdang lnga la longs spyod pas// de yis rnam smin 'bras bu 'byung// dmyal bas rang bzhin me sogs mthong// yi dwags mi gtsang mthong yul snang// byol song ngam grog gyen mthur mthong// mi yis mthong yul bzhi ru snang// lha ma yin gyi go mtshon mthong// lha yis rin chen sna bdun mthong// de dag 'gro drug sdug bsngal yin// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma rig pa las byung ba yi// 'gro drug sdug bsngal de dag kyang// 'khrul ngor bden kyang don la med// de phyir ma rig skyon du che// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ 'gro drug sdug bsngal byung tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// mu stegs 'khrul lugs bka' stsal pa// 'khrul sman chen po dang 'dra ste// gzhi dang 'khrul pa'i nyes pa de// sun bton la zlos grangs bstan pa'i// 'khrul gzhi med pa'i 'khrul pa de// ri bong rwa bzhin yod mi srid// 'khrul gzhi las ni 'khrul pa byung// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// ngo bo mi 'gyur gzhi par rigs par min// gangs kyi zhun chu khol ma dag// mkhas pas btung bar bya ba min// pad+ma ze 'bru kha mi dbye// zla tsher ma yin kha mi dbye// ma rtags bug rdol can gyi snod// kha mi dbye zhing bcud mi blug// don dang mi ldan bcos mi dgos // bsril zhing spyad par bya ba min // shel gyi mchod rten 'od 'bar ba // mgul nas gdags par bya ba min // khyung chen nam dpangs spyod pa yang // gshog pa g.yas g.yon gcod mi bya // bai DUr+ya yi rdo rje dag / ra bcag sdig pa bsam mi khyab // rin chen 'bar ba za ma tog / dug sbyor ba yi sems tsam bya mi rung // rin po che yi lcug phran rnams // cung zad snang bar spong mi bya // rdo rje 'phreng ba rgyun thag ni // 'dres shing spyan par bya ba min // spu gris gtams pa'i tshig pa dag / sus kyang dral bar bya ba min // dgos pa 'byung ba rin po che // bsreg pa'i dras gros bya mi rung // dung dang bcas pa'i me tog dag / nam yang dbul bar bya ba min // gser gyi lcags kyus ma bzung ba'i // nya sha nam yang bza' mi bya // nags khros stong pa'i phyogs dag tu // rnal 'byor mig ltar mi rung ngo // ma yis sbyar ba'i rtsi sman dag / the tshom med par rgyun mi gcad // 'phrul gyi me long snang ba'i g.ya' // rtag tu phyi zhing blta bar bya // dug sbrang 'thung dang tshong bsam gyis // 'gro nyal mi bya mar me gtang // sdom la
17
2 'khrul pa yis// rgyu 'bras log pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// thar lam mi thob 'khor bar ltung// mar 'dod bye ma btser ba bzhin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// ye med chad par 'dod pa ni// kha dog dbyibs med chad gzhi byas// snga phyi rgyu 'bras med par 'khrul// skur btab dmyal ba chen por ltung// chad du ma ster rig par yod// de phyir gzhi la gol med pas// rang byung ye shes klong na gnas// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// phung pos bsdus pa'i chos rnams kun// dang po ye med stong pa las// glo bur zil tsam phra rags skyed// de las yid sems cha phra byung// rgyu rkyen dag las byung ba ste// byung yang 'byung ba bzhi las byung// las kyi rgyu 'bras med par ni// 'byung ba lnga zhig rang thim nas// me shi thal ba rlung khyer 'dra// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// gnyis ka'i gzhi 'dod mu stegs ni// rig byed smra ba'i lta ba ste// rang sems shes pa lung ma bstan// gzhi ni nges pa med pa las// snang ba gang yang mi 'gog 'dod// gdon gyis zin pa'i smyon pa 'dra// de yi 'bras bu nges par ni// sems kyi rtsa ba ma shes pas// 'byung chen gtos kyi mun pa bzhin// thugs rje'i nyi zer zhags thag chad// dmyal ba'i 'bras bur the tshom med// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ mu stegs kyis 'khrul tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// theg pa'i rim pa bka' stsal pa// gzhi ni ngo bo nyid sku de// mthun dpe me long lta bu la// gzugs brnyan theg pa rim dgu byung// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de don rnam par phye ba ni// dang po nyan thos lta ba yang// mdo sde pa dang bye brag pa// gang zag bdag med chos bdag yod// yul la dngos por 'dzin phyir gol// da yang 'khor gyi sems dpa' nyon// snang ba phra rags yul gyi gzhi// chos la bdag tu 'dzin pa yod// zhi ba phyogs gcig thar mi thob// lhag mthong med phyir skye bo rang// don rtogs yul 'di chos kyi dbyings// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// bden pa bzhi yis sgor zhugs nas// dbugs la sems zhugs 'gog par bsgom// sngon gyis bstan pa la zhugs nas// da lta'i stan la mnyam par bzhag/ da lta'i bstan pa la bzhugs nas// mkhan slob bsdom pa'i khyad par gyis// re dogs spyod pa ched byed pa'i// dka' thub lus gdung bzod pa yi// sems kyis lus ngag btson du bzung// ma 'ongs smon lam rjes 'debs kyang// rdul dang shes pa gnyis 'dod pas// glang chen 'dam du bying ba ltar// lus ngag las kyi rtsol ba yis// 'bras bu mi thob snying rje'i gnas// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bla
18
2 ma dag la mi bsten par// rang sems don la blo sbyangs phyir// rten 'brel phyi nang rtsad bcad nas// yul rnams phyogs cha bcad gzhig nas// bse ru khyu lding dpe bzhin du// sgo lnga mi 'geg rgyu ba 'geg/ rjes 'brang med pa tsam du bsgom// nan bsgom yin phyir don dang 'gal// stong pa nyid la rten 'cha' bas// spang sdud zhen pa yod phyir gol// btsan par mi 'gyur nyams pa yis// nong bus rgyal srid bsgom pa 'dra// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// chos rnams sems su bsdus nas ni// sems tsam kun gzhi rtog pa yi// gong 'og shes dag skad gcig 'dod// rig pa rang rgyal grangs can gol// rtag dang khyad med sgro 'dogs nor// chos sku rang rig 'gyur ba med// dbu ma pa yis 'dod gzhung de// ngo bo dngos med gzhig byas te// yul sems bzhi pa stong par 'khrul// ci yang med pa'i skye mched ltung// chad dang khyad med stong par 'khrul// stong zhing rang byung chos sku yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sems tsam dbu ma'i mtshan nyid de// kun rdzob dang ni don dam du// so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// bden pa gnyis gnyis don dag tu// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du shes// don dam spros dang bral ba la// mi dmigs zhi gnas lhag mthong du// rtse gcig sems kyis ting 'dzin bsgom// spyod pa snying rjes gzhi bzung nas// pha rol phyin bcu lam lnga la// sems bskyed gzhan don ched du byed// bdag gzhan sgyu ma tsam du 'dzin// 'bras bu nges par 'dod pa ni// kun rdzob sgrib sbyangs don dam gyis// bden pa mthong ba ched du byed// gcig por nas ni gcig 'tshol ba// chu bzhag zla ba ngos 'dzin 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// thams cad rtsa ba gcig pa'i phyir// rang rig sems kyi snying po'i don// zab la rgya che mi shes par// bsam med dag tu gang 'jog pa'i// byis pa de ni blun pa ste// mun pa'i skye mched nyid du ltung// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rgyu mtshan nyid kyi lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// phyi pa kri yog rnam gsum ni// nam mkha' smig rgyu'i dpe bzhin du// dag pa chos nyid kri ya'i gzhi// bzang ngan gtsang sbras dngos grub re// grub pa mi thob byol song rgyu// gtsang sbras mi grol rtog pa nyid// spyod pa ma yengs gzhi dag sku// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// yul med rig pa rang gsal gyis// chos nyid stong pa'i ngang las ni// dag pa bzhi yi sgor zhugs nas// ma nyams ma sme gtsang sbra bcas// yo byad phyi la gtsor mdzad cing// bdag dang ye shes rje 'bangs tshul// kun rdzob lha yi
19
2 dkyil 'khor du// rgyud dag pa yi ting 'dzin gyi// sku yi gzugs brnyan phyag rgya yang// bzlas brjod gtsang sbra dus tshod kyi// rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i nus mthu yis// 'bras bu gzhan la re ba'i phyir// rigs gsum dkyil 'khor lhar gsal kyang// dngos grub gzhan la re ba'i phyir// khyi rgan 'dab chags bsnyegs pa 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// rang sems dbye ba med pa la// u pa ya yi theg pa ni// gong 'og lta spyod gnyis 'dzin pas// ne tsho mi ltar 'dod pa 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yo ga rnal 'byor sems dpa' des// dbyer med sangs rgyas gzhi byas te// byang chub rnam lngar mnyam par 'dod// bsgoms kyang mi grol 'dod khams lta// sems tsam pa dang khyad med gol// la bzla rig pa chos skur shes// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// lta ba chos nyid rnam dag la// rnam par snang mdzad chen po ru// don rtogs ngang la dbyer med phyir// phyag rgya bzhi yi sgor zhugs nas// yo byad gtso ru mi 'dzin pa// don dam skye 'gag med pa yis// lha yis dkyil 'khor 'phags pa'i sku// chos dbyings dag gi byin rlabs las// spun dang grogs po'i tshul du ni// lha dang bdag tu mnyam pa yis// dam tshig ye shes lhar gsal kyang// rgyal srid med pa'i blon po 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bla ma'i don med nan brtags kyis// dmigs pa can la sems brtags kyang// rnam par grol bar mi nus te// nam mkha' dag la 'dzin pa 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ phyi pa rgyud kyi lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig ston pas bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor ma hA yo ga yis// nam mkha'i sprin dang khu rlangs bzhin// bden pa dbyed med 'dod pa'i gzhi// rtog tshogs lhar bsgyur bsgom pas 'khrul// de phyir bgegs dang ru drar ltung// dbu ma dang 'dra 'bras bu gol// lam la mi brten rtog pas chod// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// 'khor 'das ye nas sangs rgyas la// sems kyi rnam rtog ci skyes kyang// mtshan ma dngos po ma grub cing// dper na nam mkha'i bser bu bzhin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yod med dbus la mi gnas pas// sku gsum ye shes lhun grub kyi// yul sems dbye ba med par 'dod// de phyir bden pa gnyis med gzhi// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de don lam gyi rim pa ni// thabs dang shes rab sgor zhugs nas// ting 'dzin gsum gyis lhar bsgom pa// grib ma gzugs su bsgyur pa 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// yang dag nges pa'i 'bras bu
20
2 ni// bsnyen bsgrub tshad du byas pa yis// sku gsum ye shes lhun grub 'dod// de phyir ye shes bsres pas nor// rtsol bsgrub yod phyir don dang 'gal// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// a nu yo ga'i 'dod pa de// kun gzhi mkha' klong gzhi byas te// snang ba kun bzang rol bar 'khrul// yod min med min skye mched dang// mkha' klong dbu ma chad dang 'dra// la bzla chos kyi dbyings nyid yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// phyi nang chos rnams ma lus kun// yid dang kun gzhi gnyis 'dus pas// yang dag bde chen thugs kyi sras// phyi nang chos kun mnyam pa nyid// dran pa tsam gyis lhar gsal gyis// ngang 'jog ched bya rtsol ba yod// de phyir kun tu bzang po yi// kun gzhi mkha' klong rnam dag tu// rnam rtog mtshan ma gang spyod kyang// nam mkha' gza' skar btsal med bzhin// kun bzang bde chen thabs kyi gtso// kun tu bzang mo gnyis med mkhar// 'du 'bral med pa chos kyi sku// bde chen gnyis med rig pa'i rtsal// nges pa'i gsang sgo ma shes pas// kun bzang spyod pa'i don mi rtogs// nyi ma sprin gyis sgrib pa 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sems nyid rtsol ba med pa la// bsam pa'i dbang gis bsgyur byas pas// 'khor ba rgya mtshor g.yeng gyur te// mi shes pa la de ltar snang// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ bskyed rdzogs gnyis bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun rig chos kyi rgyal po yis// rdzogs chen spyi yis 'khrul tshul ni// 'khor la ched du bka' stsal pa// spyi dang kha 'byams kun brtags dang// tshig zin lung gis 'khrul tshul ni// nga yis khyod la don bshad kyis// legs par nyon la yid kyis zung// rdzogs chen spyi yis 'khrul tshul ni// rin chen gser sbrul mthong stong bzhin// spyi dang kha 'byams kun brtags dang// lung tshig tsam la khungs nges pa// de dag gol bar ngas bshad nyon// ming ni tshig tsam shes pa'i gzhi// mkhas su re nas tha snyad 'dogs// don med nam mkha'i mtha' 'tshol 'dra// tshig tu shes pas don mi rtogs// tshig nyid don yin zer ba 'khrul// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// kha 'byams dpal bo'i 'khrul pa de// snang bas sems sdud gzhi ru byed// 'khrul pa'i dbye ba lhun grub bcu// 'bras bu mi 'byung log par gol// gzhi dang ma mthun lung rig 'gal// gzhi nyid mi shes skye bo rang// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// kun brtags lhar ni 'khrul pa yi// phyi nang gsang sngags snang ba bzhin// bskyed dang rdzogs 'dod rim par 'khrul// don ma zin pas 'bras bu med// gzhi la lha med
21
2 bskyed mi dgos// ma skyes chos sku ye nas yin// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// tshig zin lung gi 'khrul tshul de// tshig tsam lung la khungs med bzhis// dgongs pa rnam gsum ma shes 'khrul// tshig tsam lung gis don ma rtogs// don med tshig ni 'di dag gis// lung med don go ye sangs rgyas// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag 'khrul pa rnam bzhi yang// spyi yi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir// gzhi dang 'gal phyir don las gol// de phyir lung bstan gdams ngag dgos// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rdzogs chen spyi'i 'khrul tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// sdom du bsdus te bstan pa las gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi don ched du// kun rig rang byung ston pa la// dad pa'i yid kyis 'di skad gsol// phyi yi rdzogs pa chen po a ti yi// chos rnam sems su ji ltar 'dus// mun pa'i sems kyis ji ltar bsgribs// sems 'dod lta ba ji ltar gol// rang sems nges don ji ltar min// sems ngan dpe yis dbye ba gang// tshogs brgyad skyon du ji ltar che// kun rig ston pas bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pas don gsan nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sems su chos rnams gcig pa ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// sgyu ma rnam gnyis spyod yul te// log rtog ye shes tha dad kyang// sems kyi chos nyid ngang du gcig/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// de yang de nyid mtshon pa'i dpe// sprin dang gzha' tshon khu rlangs dang// 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa// nam mkha'i ngang du ro gcig bzhin// yul gyi tha snyad mtshan ma rnams// rang gi sems kyis rtog pa'i phyir// phyi nang chos kun sems su gcig/ de phyir chos rnams ma lus kun// rigs rgyud med phyir sems su gcig/ da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// ma rigs 'khrul pa'i sems 'di yis// byang chub thob 'dod snying re rje// nyid la nyid 'khrul yin pa'i phyir// smyon pas grib ma bsnyegs pa 'dra// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ chos thams cad sems su 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// kun rig rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// ma rig sems kyi mun pa 'di// spang sdud zhen pa'i rtog pa dang// bag chags nyon mongs 'khor ba ste// de bral chos sku'i thig le yin// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// spang ba'i rtog la skyes pa'i che// 'du byed lnga bcu skar phran 'dra// tshogs brgyad skye 'gag zla ba 'dra// kun gzhi nam
22
2 mkha'i sprin dang 'dra// de klong thig le nyag gcig yod// dper na nyi ma'i 'od sgrib 'dra// rang la skyes pa'i sgrib pa rnams// spang bas mi spong grib ma 'dra// de phyir spang ba'i rtog pa gol// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sdud pa'i rtog pa skyes pa'i tshe// 'du byed mtsho kha'i ngang ngur 'dra// tshogs brgyad nya la sram ldang 'dra// kun gzhi rgya mtsho chen po 'dra// nang na thig le nyag gcig bzhugs// dpe ni u dum wa ra 'dra// kha na mi mngon gting na gnas// de bzhin yul dang 'bral med phyir// de bsad sha la zos pa med// sems yin chos kyis sangs mi rgya// de phyir sdud pa'i rtog pa gol// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// zhen pa'i rtog pa skyes pa'i tshe// 'du byed lnga bcu nags tshal 'dra// rnam shes tshogs brgyad ri dwags 'dra// kun gzhi'i bag chags rtsa grangs 'dra// de yi gseb na chos sku bzhugs// dpe ni seng ge dkar mo 'dra// gzhan gyis mthong ba med pa bzhin// dngos po'i yul la byang chub med// de phyir zhen pa'i rtog pa gol// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// sngar gyi bag chags dran pa'i tshe// 'du byed lnga bcu chu ltar 'brub// rnam shes tshogs brgyad me ltar 'bar// kun gzhi'i bag chags gzing ltar 'dzings// de gseb thig le nyag gcig bzhugs// dper ni rin chen gser dang 'dra// de don rnyed pa dka' ba'i phyir// bag chags dge sdig bsags pa'i las// sems la 'dzin pa yod phyir gol// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// phyis kyi nyon mongs skyes pa'i tshe// 'du byed lnga bcu rlung ltar 'tshubs// rnam shes tshogs brgyad rbab ltar rgod// kun gzhi'i nyon mongs mun ltar gtibs// de nang thig le chos sku yod// dper na rin chen 'dam bying 'dra// kha nas mi mthong gting na gnas// ma rig nyon mongs gting na gnas// ma rig nyon mongs skyes pa'i tshe// 'khor ba'i mtha' la zad pa med// de phyir phyi ma'i rgyur byung gol// da yang 'khor gyi snying po nyon// snga phyi'i rtog pa skyes pa yi// sems dang sems byung la sogs pa// ma rig 'khrul pas rtag tu myos// de phyir kun gzhi 'khor ba'i chos// rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ sems kyi mun pas thig le nyag gcig sgrib par bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// sems 'dod gol bar bka' stsal pa// sems kyis chos sku bsgribs pa'i phyir// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi bar do ni// thog mtha' gcod ni ma shes na// skye rga na 'chi las mi thar// sa mkhan med pa'i tshong pa 'dra// skye 'chi gnyis kyi bar dor ni// chos sku'i ngo sprod ma shes na// ma rig mun pa sangs dus med// sgron ma med pa'i
23
2 mun khungs 'dra// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// lus sems gnyis kyi bar do na// gol sa gcod ni ma shes na// nyon mongs zhen pa ldog mi srid// dred mong gdos kyis zin pa 'dra// mnyam bzhag rjes thob bar do na// rgyun du 'bral med ma shes na// blta bsgom gnyis kyis rkyen mi thub// chu bran than pas bskam pa 'dra// srid pa dag gi bar do ni// sangs rgyas dus ni ma shes na// gzugs sku rnam gnyis 'byung mi srid// rin chen gdam du stor ba 'dra// bdag gzhan rtsod pa'i bar do ni// gal mdo tshig gi 'phrang med na// theg pa gzhan las bogs mi thob// g.yul ngo pham pa'i blon po 'dra// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// de dag gdams ngag med pa'i skyon// sems kyi rtsa ba ma rig pas// 'khrul pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i phyir// 'khor ba'i rtsa ba chags sdang lngas// ngan song gsum du rtag tu 'khor// de phyir ma rig sems kyis 'khrul// da yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyon// sems kyi 'dod lugs rnam pa bcu// nan brtags lta ba log par bstan// de phyir snang ba sems su byas// nges don shes pa blo yis bcos// yang dag sems med chos ma shes// de phyir lung med rigs pas dpyad// yul sems gcig par blo yis bsres// da yang 'dus pa'i snying po nyon// bde gshegs snying po ma mthong bar// lung ldan nges pa'i don
